AndaSharkToo_murky.name: ... And a Shark Too!

His Basic Attacks deal 172.64 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 86.32 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10.5 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

BottomlessMug_chen.description: Reduces Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 2 seconds.

BouncyDust_brightwing.name: Bouncy Dust
BouncyDust_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust bounces to another nearby ally upon impact.

BoundbyShadow_guldan.name: Bound by Shadow
BoundbyShadow_guldan.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

BoundMinion_azmodan.name: Bound Minion
BoundMinion_azmodan.description: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

BoundlessConviction_uther.name: Boundless Conviction
BoundlessConviction_uther.description: Increases the width and length of Holy Radiance by 40%.

BoundlessStride_lunara.name: Boundless Stride
BoundlessStride_lunara.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

BreakitDown_gazlowe.name: Break it Down!
BreakitDown_gazlowe.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3.07 seconds.

BrewStrike_chen.name: Brew Strike
BrewStrike_chen.description: Keg Smash reduces the cooldown of Flying Kick by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit.

BrewmastersBalance_chen.name: Brewmaster's Balance
BrewmastersBalance_chen.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18.72 (+4% per level) Health per second.

BringitTogether_lucio.name: Bring it Together
BringitTogether_lucio.description: If at least 2 is increased by 45% for the duration.

BronzeTalons_chromie.name: Bronze Talons
BronzeTalons_chromie.description: Increases Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

BroodExpansion_zagara.name: Brood Expansion
BroodExpansion_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

BroodlingNest_zagara.name: Broodling Nest
BroodlingNest_zagara.description: Exiting a Nydus Worm spawns 6 broodlings to attack up the nearest lane. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

BrutalStrike_thebutcher.name: Brutal Strike
BrutalStrike_thebutcher.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

BubbleBreeze_murky.name: Bubble Breeze
BubbleBreeze_murky.description: Gain 20% Movement Speed while in Safety Bubble.

BubbleMachine_murky.name: Bubble Machine
BubbleMachine_murky.description: Safety Bubble cooldown reduced by 5 seconds.

BulletSpray_tracer.name: Bullet Spray
BulletSpray_tracer.description: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

BulletTime_tracer.name: Bullet Time
BulletTime_tracer.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

BullheadMines_sgthammer.name: Bullhead Mines
BullheadMines_sgthammer.description: Middle Spider Mine knocks target back a short distance.

Bullseye_raynor.name: Bullseye
Bullseye_raynor.description: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

Bulwark_diablo.name: Bulwark
Bulwark_diablo.description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

BulwarkofLight_uther.name: Bulwark of Light
BulwarkofLight_uther.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

BurdenofGuilt_uther.name: Burden of Guilt
BurdenofGuilt_uther.description: After Hammer of Justice's stun fades, the enemy's Movement Speed is slowed by 30% for 2 seconds.

BuriedAlive_leoric.name: Buried Alive
BuriedAlive_leoric.description: Enemies inside Entomb take 93.6 (+4% per level) damage per second.

BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.name: Burned Flesh
BurnedFlesh_kaelthas.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

BurningBlade_samuro.name: Burning Blade
BurningBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

BurningRage_anubarak.name: Burning Rage
BurningRage_anubarak.description: Deal 23.92 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

BurstingLight_auriel.name: Bursting Light
BurstingLight_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ray of Heaven by 2 seconds.

Buzzsaw_zuljin.name: Buzzsaw
Buzzsaw_zuljin.description: After impact, the Guillotine continues forward, dealing 50% of Guillotine's damage to enemies in the line.

ByeBye_chromie.name: Bye Bye!
ByeBye_chromie.description: Reduces the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

CthunsGift_cho.name: C'thun's Gift
CthunsGift_cho.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

CaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
CaduceusReactor20_ltmorales.description: While Caduceus Reactor is active, Lt. Morales gains 8 Mana a second and a Shield that absorbs 99.84 (+4% per level) damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Calamity_liming.name: Calamity
Calamity_liming.description: Teleport does 309 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

CalloftheGrave_xul.name: Call of the Grave
CalloftheGrave_xul.description: Poison Nova deals an additional 1% of the target's maximum life as damage every second.

CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.name: Call of the Wildhammer
CalloftheWildhammer_falstad.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

CalldownMULE_abathur.name: Calldown: MULE
CalldownMULE_abathur.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

CallousedHide_cho.name: Calloused Hide
CallousedHide_cho.description: Ogre Hide also increases healing received by 15%.

Caltrops_valla.name: Caltrops
Caltrops_valla.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 62.4 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 180 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

CantStopWontStop_lucio.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
CantStopWontStop_lucio.description: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, Lúcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

Cannoneer_liming.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer_liming.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

CatchingFire_ragnaros.name: Catching Fire
CatchingFire_ragnaros.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second, up to 22.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

CauterizeWounds_ragnaros.name: Cauterize Wounds
CauterizeWounds_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 50% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

CelestialAttunement_tyrande.name: Celestial Attunement
CelestialAttunement_tyrande.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Light of Elune by 15.

CelestialWrath_tyrande.name: Celestial Wrath
CelestialWrath_tyrande.description: Starfall can be cast globally.  Damage is increased by 30%.

CentrifugalHooks_zagara.name: Centrifugal Hooks
CentrifugalHooks_zagara.description: Banelings can travel twice as far before exploding.

ChainBomb_kaelthas.name: Chain Bomb
ChainBomb_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's explosion applies Living Bomb to the 3 closest enemies not already affected by it.  Prefers Heroes.

ChainReaction_rehgar.name: Chain Reaction
ChainReaction_rehgar.description: Chain Heals on allies with Lightning Shield active are increased by 25%.

ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.name: Change Is Survival
ChangeIsSurvival_dehaka.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

ChaosReigns_alarak.name: Chaos Reigns
ChaosReigns_alarak.description: Quest: Each time Discord Strike hits a Hero its damage increases by 3, up to 45. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 45.

ChaoticEnergy_guldan.name: Chaotic Energy
ChaoticEnergy_guldan.description: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes Gul'dan's next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes Gul'dan's Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

ChargedBlast_liming.name: Charged Blast
ChargedBlast_liming.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 90.48 (+4% per level) damage.

ChargedUp_falstad.name: Charged Up
ChargedUp_falstad.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

ChasetheBass_lucio.name: Chase the Bass
ChasetheBass_lucio.description: Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave. Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50.005% and its range by 20%.

CheapShot_thebutcher.name: Cheap Shot
CheapShot_thebutcher.description: Hamstring does 104% (+4% per level) more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.name: Checkpoint Reached
CheckpointReached_thelostvikings.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

ChewYourFood_stitches.name: Chew Your Food
ChewYourFood_stitches.description: Using Devour also heals Stitches for 9.555% of his max Health over 3.063 seconds.

ChitinousPlating_anubarak.name: Chitinous Plating
ChitinousPlating_anubarak.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 3 seconds.

ChokingPollen_lunara.name: Choking Pollen
ChokingPollen_lunara.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

ChopMeat_thebutcher.name: Chop Meat
ChopMeat_thebutcher.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

ChronoSickness_chromie.name: Chrono Sickness
ChronoSickness_chromie.description: Reduces Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

ChronoSurge_artanis.name: Chrono Surge
ChronoSurge_artanis.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 50% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

CircleofLife_kharazim.name: Circle of Life
CircleofLife_kharazim.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's healing by 10% for each allied Hero in the cast range.

CircleofProtection_medivh.name: Circle of Protection
CircleofProtection_medivh.description: An untalented Force of Will is also applied to allies near the target.

CleanKill_kerrigan.name: Clean Kill
CleanKill_kerrigan.description: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of the next Ravage by 25%.

Cleanse_brightwing.name: Cleanse
Cleanse_brightwing.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

CleansingShield_zarya.name: Cleansing Shield
CleansingShield_zarya.description: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

CleansingTouch_kharazim.name: Cleansing Touch
CleansingTouch_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

ClearOut_zarya.name: Clear Out
ClearOut_zarya.description: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by -99.85% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 10 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

Clear_ltmorales.name: Clear!
Clear_ltmorales.description: Displacement Grenade's explosion radius increased by 33% and knocks back farther.

Cleaver_thebutcher.name: Cleaver
Cleaver_thebutcher.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

CloakofShadows_valeera.name: Cloak of Shadows
CloakofShadows_valeera.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

ClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
ClockwerkSteamFists_gazlowe.description: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by <c val="#TooltipNumbers"><d ref="$GalaxyVar:libGDHL_gv_heroTinkerClockwerkSteamfistsDurationScale$"precision="1"/>undefined seconds. Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

ClusterRound_raynor.name: Cluster Round
ClusterRound_raynor.description: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

Cocoon_anubarak.name: Cocoon
Cocoon_anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

ColdBlood_valeera.name: Cold Blood
ColdBlood_valeera.description: Activate to increase the damage of Valeera's next Eviscerate by 100%.  Activating Cold Blood does not break Vanish.

ColdEmbrace_sylvanas.name: Cold Embrace
ColdEmbrace_sylvanas.description: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

ColdSnap_jaina.name: Cold Snap
ColdSnap_jaina.description: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

ColossalTotem_rehgar.name: Colossal Totem
ColossalTotem_rehgar.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

ColossusSmash_varian.name: Colossus Smash
ColossusSmash_varian.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 166.4 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 25 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 25% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive:Maximum Health reduced by 10%.

CombatReadiness_valeera.name: Combat Readiness
CombatReadiness_valeera.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.

CombatStance_chen.name: Combat Stance
CombatStance_chen.description: Shields from Fortifying Brew last for an additional 3 seconds after drinking stops.

CombatTactician_tychus.name: Combat Tactician
CombatTactician_tychus.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

CombinationAttack_chen.name: Combination Attack
CombinationAttack_chen.description: The next Basic Attack after using Flying Kick deals 100% bonus damage.

ComboSlash_zeratul.name: Combo Slash
ComboSlash_zeratul.description: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals40% additional damage.

CommandeerOdin_tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
CommandeerOdin_tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

CompositeArrows_valla.name: Composite Arrows
CompositeArrows_valla.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20%.

CompositeSpear_sonya.name: Composite Spear
CompositeSpear_sonya.description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

CompositionB_tracer.name: Composition B
CompositionB_tracer.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

CompoundingAether_chromie.name: Compounding Aether
CompoundingAether_chromie.description: Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes with Sand Blast, increase its damage by 100.

CompressedAir_murky.name: Compressed Air
CompressedAir_murky.description: Increases the radius of Pufferfish by 50%.

ConcentratedBlast_greymane.name: Concentrated Blast
ConcentratedBlast_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's damage by 80% while Inner Beast is active.

ConcussionGrenade_tychus.name: Concussion Grenade
ConcussionGrenade_tychus.description: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

ConfidentAim_raynor.name: Confident Aim
ConfidentAim_raynor.description: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

ConjurersPursuit_jaina.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
ConjurersPursuit_jaina.description: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes increases your Mana Regeneration by 0.102 per second, up to 2.5 per second. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, also increase your maximum Mana by 100.

ConstructAdditionalPylons_probius.name: Construct Additional Pylons
ConstructAdditionalPylons_probius.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

ConsumeSoul_guldan.name: Consume Soul
ConsumeSoul_guldan.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 379.6 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ConsumeVitality_leoric.name: Consume Vitality
ConsumeVitality_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing heals Leoric for 2% of his maximum Health per target hit, up to 10%. Half as effective while Undying.

ConsumingFire_cho.name: Consuming Fire
ConsumingFire_cho.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

ConsumingFlame_chen.name: Consuming Flame
ConsumingFlame_chen.description: Breath of Fire's burn effect when used on Brew-soaked targets is increased by 2 seconds.

Contagion_dehaka.name: Contagion
Contagion_dehaka.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

ContinuousSlime_murky.name: Continuous Slime
ContinuousSlime_murky.description: Decreases the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 3 seconds.

ContinuousWinds_brightwing.name: Continuous Winds
ContinuousWinds_brightwing.description: Emerald Wind releases two additional novas that deal 25% damage. Also further increases the healing bonus of Soothing Mist by 7%.

Convection_kaelthas.name: Convection
Convection_kaelthas.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

ConvergingForce_auriel.name: Converging Force
ConvergingForce_auriel.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

Conviction_johanna.name: Conviction
Conviction_johanna.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

CorpseExplosion_xul.name: Corpse Explosion
CorpseExplosion_xul.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 57.2 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

CorpseFeeders_zagara.name: Corpse Feeders
CorpseFeeders_zagara.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.name: Corrosive Saliva
CorrosiveSaliva_zagara.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

Corruption_sylvanas.name: Corruption
Corruption_sylvanas.description: Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 2 Ammunition.

CostEffectiveMaterials_valla.name: Cost-Effective Materials
CostEffectiveMaterials_valla.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 30.

CounterStrike_alarak.name: Counter-Strike
CounterStrike_alarak.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over your Trait button.

CouplesTherapy_ltmorales.name: Couples Therapy
CouplesTherapy_ltmorales.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales is healed for 25% of the healing amount at the cost of an additional 4 Mana per second.

CovertMission_nova.name: Covert Mission
CovertMission_nova.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

CovertOps_nova.name: Covert Ops
CovertOps_nova.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

CraveFlesh_thebutcher.name: Crave Flesh
CraveFlesh_thebutcher.description: While an enemy is affected by Butcher's Brand, you gain 30% Movement Speed.

CreedoftheHunter_valla.name: Creed of the Hunter
CreedoftheHunter_valla.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

CripplingBlow_cho.name: Crippling Blow
CripplingBlow_cho.description: Enemies hit by Surging Fist are slowed by 90% for 1.25 seconds.

CripplingPoison_valeera.name: Crippling Poison
CripplingPoison_valeera.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

CripplingShot_nova.name: Crippling Shot
CripplingShot_nova.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

CripplingSlam_thebutcher.name: Crippling Slam
CripplingSlam_thebutcher.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 25%.

CripplingTalons_rexxar.name: Crippling Talons
CripplingTalons_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to3 seconds.

CriticalCare_rexxar.name: Critical Care
CriticalCare_rexxar.description: Increases the healing of Mend Pet by 50% while Misha is under 50% health.

Critterize_brightwing.name: Critterize
Critterize_brightwing.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

CrowdControl_muradin.name: Crowd Control
CrowdControl_muradin.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana, to a maximum of 9 targets.

CrowdPleaser_etc.name: Crowd Pleaser
CrowdPleaser_etc.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

CrowdSurfer_etc.name: Crowd Surfer
CrowdSurfer_etc.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

CruelSpores_lunara.name: Cruel Spores
CruelSpores_lunara.description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

CrushingBlows_samuro.name: Crushing Blows
CrushingBlows_samuro.description: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

CrushingHope_leoric.name: Crushing Hope
CrushingHope_leoric.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the victim's Maximum Health. This damage does not heal Leoric.

Cryptweave_anubarak.name: Cryptweave
Cryptweave_anubarak.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 4 seconds per Cocoon.

CrystalAegis_auriel.name: Crystal Aegis
CrystalAegis_auriel.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 280.8 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

CurseofExhaustion_guldan.name: Curse of Exhaustion
CurseofExhaustion_guldan.description: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

CursedBullet_greymane.name: Cursed Bullet
CursedBullet_greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

CycleofDiscord_alarak.name: Cycle of Discord
CycleofDiscord_alarak.description: Reduces the cooldown of Discord Strike by 2 seconds. If Discord Strike fails to hit any enemies, the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

DampenMagic_stitches.name: Dampen Magic
DampenMagic_stitches.description: Every 8 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

DanceOfDeath_samuro.name: Dance Of Death
DanceOfDeath_samuro.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

DarkBargain_guldan.name: Dark Bargain
DarkBargain_guldan.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

DarkDescent_gall.name: Dark Descent
DarkDescent_gall.description: Increases Runic Blast's damage by 5% every time you get a Hero Takedown, up to 20%. These bonuses are lost upon dying.

DarkLadysCall_sylvanas.name: Dark Lady's Call
DarkLadysCall_sylvanas.description: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

DarknessWithin_guldan.name: Darkness Within
DarknessWithin_guldan.description: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Spell Power.

Dash_tychus.name: Dash
Dash_tychus.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

DashofLight_kharazim.name: Dash of Light
DashofLight_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3 seconds.

DeadRush_nazeebo.name: Dead Rush
DeadRush_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

DeadlyCharge_alarak.name: Deadly Charge
DeadlyCharge_alarak.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. 
<c val="ffff8a">This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

DeadlyStrike_chen.name: Deadly Strike
DeadlyStrike_chen.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

DeafeningBlast_gall.name: Deafening Blast
DeafeningBlast_gall.description: Runic Blast silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

DeafeningBlast_sylvanas.name: Deafening Blast
DeafeningBlast_sylvanas.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

DeathDealer_valla.name: Death Dealer
DeathDealer_valla.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

DeathFromAbove_valeera.name: Death From Above
DeathFromAbove_valeera.description: Ambush now has 7 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

DeathMarch_leoric.name: Death March
DeathMarch_leoric.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies an untalented Drain Hope to all enemy Heroes in a large area.

DeathMetal_etc.name: Death Metal
DeathMetal_etc.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

DeathRitual_nazeebo.name: Death Ritual
DeathRitual_nazeebo.description: Quest: When a Minion dies under the effects of Voodoo Ritual, increase your maximum Health by 5 and your maximum Mana by 3.

DeathSiphon_valla.name: Death Siphon
DeathSiphon_valla.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 35.36 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

DeathTouch_arthas.name: Death Touch
DeathTouch_arthas.description: Death Coil causes enemy Minions to explode, killing the target instantly and dealing its normal damage to other nearby enemies.

DeathsAdvance_arthas.name: Death's Advance
DeathsAdvance_arthas.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

Deathlord_arthas.name: Deathlord
Deathlord_arthas.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

DebilitatingFlames_diablo.name: Debilitating Flames
DebilitatingFlames_diablo.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

Debilitation_anubarak.name: Debilitation
Debilitation_anubarak.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 4 seconds.

Decrepify_xul.name: Decrepify
Decrepify_xul.description: Spectral Scythe slows enemies by 40% for 3 seconds.

DeepBreath_chen.name: Deep Breath
DeepBreath_chen.description: Increases Breath of Fire's range and arc by 30% and the Brew cost is reduced by 10.

DeepBreathing_chromie.name: Deep Breathing
DeepBreathing_chromie.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

DeepChill_jaina.name: Deep Chill
DeepChill_jaina.description: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

DeepImpact_guldan.name: Deep Impact
DeepImpact_guldan.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

DeepShift_tassadar.name: Deep Shift
DeepShift_tassadar.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

DefensiveShielding_zarya.name: Defensive Shielding
DefensiveShielding_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

Deflection_samuro.name: Deflection
Deflection_samuro.description: Advancing Strikes grants 25 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

DemolitionsExpert_zarya.name: Demolitions Expert
DemolitionsExpert_zarya.description: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.5 seconds, up to 4 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

DemonicCircle_guldan.name: Demonic Circle
DemonicCircle_guldan.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

DemonicForm_illidan.name: Demonic Form
DemonicForm_illidan.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

DemonicInvasion_azmodan.name: Demonic Invasion
DemonicInvasion_azmodan.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 108.16 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 53.04 (+4% per level) damage and have 379.6 (+4% per level) health.

DemonicSmite_azmodan.name: Demonic Smite
DemonicSmite_azmodan.description: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 427.44 (+4% per level) damage.

DemonicStrength_diablo.name: Demonic Strength
DemonicStrength_diablo.description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

DemoralizingShout_varian.name: Demoralizing Shout
DemoralizingShout_varian.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 25% for 5 seconds.

Destruction_arthas.name: Destruction
Destruction_arthas.description: Damage boost of Frostmourne Hungers increased to 150% damage.

DevastatingCharge_diablo.name: Devastating Charge
DevastatingCharge_diablo.description: Shadow Charge's terrain collision against Heroes deals an additional 5% of the target's maximum life. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase the maximum life damage by 2%, to a maximum of 10% bonus.

DevilsDue_diablo.name: Devil's Due
DevilsDue_diablo.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2% per Soul.

DevourtheFrail_guldan.name: Devour the Frail
DevourtheFrail_guldan.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

DevouringMaw_zagara.name: Devouring Maw
DevouringMaw_zagara.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 83.2 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.name: Diabolical Momentum
DiabolicalMomentum_diablo.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Overpower and Shadow Charge by 1.5 seconds.

DiamondResolve_auriel.name: Diamond Resolve
DiamondResolve_auriel.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 50 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

DiamondSkin_liming.name: Diamond Skin
DiamondSkin_liming.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 20% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

DimensionalWarp_tassadar.name: Dimensional Warp
DimensionalWarp_tassadar.description: While Dimensional Shifted, gain 50% Movement Speed and heal for 399.36 (+4% per level) Health.

DireBeast_rexxar.name: Dire Beast
DireBeast_rexxar.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

Disintegrate_liming.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate_liming.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 462 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

Dissonance_alarak.name: Dissonance
Dissonance_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases Discord Strike's silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

DistortionBeam_tassadar.name: Distortion Beam
DistortionBeam_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

DividingWisp_lunara.name: Dividing Wisp
DividingWisp_lunara.description: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

DivineHurricane_uther.name: Divine Hurricane
DivineHurricane_uther.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

DivinePalm_kharazim.name: Divine Palm
DivinePalm_kharazim.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1186.64 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

DivineShield_uther.name: Divine Shield
DivineShield_uther.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

DivineStorm_uther.name: Divine Storm
DivineStorm_uther.description: Deal 194.48 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

Dominance_liming.name: Dominance
Dominance_liming.description: Takedowns restore 19.92% of Li-Ming's maximum Health.

Domination_diablo.name: Domination
Domination_diablo.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

DoubleBack_gall.name: Double Back
DoubleBack_gall.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

DoubleBombs_zeratul.name: Double Bombs
DoubleBombs_zeratul.description: After you cast Singularity Spike, you can cast a second one for free within 3 seconds for 50% normal damage.

DoubleCross_alarak.name: Double Cross
DoubleCross_alarak.description: Increases the range of Discord Strike by 25% and also hits in a line perpendicular to the forward strike.

DoubleDragon_lili.name: Double Dragon
DoubleDragon_lili.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

DoubleFake_nova.name: Double Fake
DoubleFake_nova.description: Casting Holo Decoy creates an additional Decoy at your current location.

DoubleStrike_kerrigan.name: Double Strike
DoubleStrike_kerrigan.description: When a Basic Ability damages an enemy, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

DoubleTrouble_gall.name: Double Trouble
DoubleTrouble_gall.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 1 second.

DoubleWyrmhole_brightwing.name: Double Wyrmhole
DoubleWyrmhole_brightwing.description: Blink Heal can be cast a second time on a different target within 2 seconds without consuming a charge.

DoubleBarreled_raynor.name: Double-Barreled
DoubleBarreled_raynor.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

DragonsEye_chromie.name: Dragon's Eye
DragonsEye_chromie.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

DrainMomentum_leoric.name: Drain Momentum
DrainMomentum_leoric.description: Drain Hope now increases Leoric's Movement Speed by 10% instead of reducing it.

DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
DrakkenLaserDrill_tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 147.68 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

DraughtOverflow_greymane.name: Draught Overflow
DraughtOverflow_greymane.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

DreadShield_gall.name: Dread Shield
DreadShield_gall.description: When Dread Orb hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield absorbing 266.24 (+4% per level) damage for 5 seconds.

DreadfulWake_sylvanas.name: Dreadful Wake
DreadfulWake_sylvanas.description: Haunting Wave's application of Black Arrow on Minions and Mercenaries increases the duration to 7 seconds. Haunting Wave restores 5 Mana per Minion or Mercenary hit.

DreamShot_brightwing.name: Dream Shot
DreamShot_brightwing.description: Reduces the cooldown of Arcane Flare by 1 second for each enemy Hero hit by the outer radius, and 3 seconds for each hit by the inner radius.

DuskWings_raynor.name: Dusk Wings
DuskWings_raynor.description: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

DustofAppearance_medivh.name: Dust of Appearance
DustofAppearance_medivh.description: Activate to reveal enemy Heroes in the area surrounding Medivh for 10 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.

DwarfLaunch_muradin.name: Dwarf Launch
DwarfLaunch_muradin.description: Increases the range and impact radius of Dwarf Toss by 50%.

DyingBreath_diablo.name: Dying Breath
DyingBreath_diablo.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

EagerWolf_greymane.name: Eager Wolf
EagerWolf_greymane.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

EarthAlly_kharazim.name: Earth Ally
EarthAlly_kharazim.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 416 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

EarthShield_rehgar.name: Earth Shield
EarthShield_rehgar.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

EarthenShields_thrall.name: Earthen Shields
EarthenShields_thrall.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

EarthgraspTotem_rehgar.name: Earthgrasp Totem
EarthgraspTotem_rehgar.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

EarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.name: Earthliving Enchant
EarthlivingEnchant_rehgar.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 208 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

Earthquake_thrall.name: Earthquake
Earthquake_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 52 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

EasyPrey_rexxar.name: Easy Prey
EasyPrey_rexxar.description: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

EchoofHeaven_kharazim.name: Echo of Heaven
EchoofHeaven_kharazim.description: Breath of Heaven heals -24% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

EchoPedal_etc.name: Echo Pedal
EchoPedal_etc.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 30.16 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 75% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

EchoPulse_probius.name: Echo Pulse
EchoPulse_probius.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing -24% damage on the return trip.

EchoedCorruption_guldan.name: Echoed Corruption
EchoedCorruption_guldan.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

EdgeofMadness_gall.name: Edge of Madness
EdgeofMadness_gall.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 4 seconds.

EggHunt_murky.name: Egg Hunt
EggHunt_murky.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

EggShell_murky.name: Egg Shell
EggShell_murky.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

ElectricCharge_rehgar.name: Electric Charge
ElectricCharge_rehgar.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

ElementalConduit_chen.name: Elemental Conduit
ElementalConduit_chen.description:
Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.  Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

ElunesGrace_malfurion.name: Elune's Grace
ElunesGrace_malfurion.description: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

ElusiveBrawler_chen.name: Elusive Brawler
ElusiveBrawler_chen.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 3 seconds.

ElusiveFeet_lili.name: Elusive Feet
ElusiveFeet_lili.description: When Fast Feet is triggered, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 10 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

ElusiveStrike_illidan.name: Elusive Strike
ElusiveStrike_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

Elusiveness_valeera.name: Elusiveness
Elusiveness_valeera.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

EmbraceDeath_arthas.name: Embrace Death
EmbraceDeath_arthas.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

EmeraldWind_brightwing.name: Emerald Wind
EmeraldWind_brightwing.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 331.76 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.  Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

EmpathicLink_auriel.name: Empathic Link
EmpathicLink_auriel.description: Auriel stores 20% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

Empower_tyrande.name: Empower
Empower_tyrande.description: When Sentinel impacts, Tyrande's cooldowns are instantly reduced by 2 seconds.

EmpoweringCharge_rehgar.name: Empowering Charge
EmpoweringCharge_rehgar.description: Lightning Shield also increases the damage of the target's next 3 Basic Attacks by 30.00%.

Encore_etc.name: Encore
Encore_etc.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

EndlessCreep_zagara.name: Endless Creep
EndlessCreep_zagara.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

EndlessEnergy_alarak.name: Endless Energy
EndlessEnergy_alarak.description: Quest: Heroes hit between Alarak and his victim permanently decreases the cooldown of Lightning Surge by 0.2 seconds, up to 2 seconds.

EnduranceTraining_zarya.name: Endurance Training
EnduranceTraining_zarya.description: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

EnduringGrowth_malfurion.name: Enduring Growth
EnduringGrowth_malfurion.description: Increases the duration of Regrowth by 6 seconds.

EnduringSwarm_dehaka.name: Enduring Swarm
EnduringSwarm_dehaka.description: Dark Swarm grants 40 Spell Armor, reducing Ability damage taken by 40%.

EnduringWill_medivh.name: Enduring Will
EnduringWill_medivh.description: Increases Force of Will duration by 33.333%.

EnergizedCord_auriel.name: Energized Cord
EnergizedCord_auriel.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 60.4% of the damage against Heroes and 42.08% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

EnergizingGrasp_kerrigan.name: Energizing Grasp
EnergizingGrasp_kerrigan.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Primal Grasp by 75%.

EnergyRoil_kaelthas.name: Energy Roil
EnergyRoil_kaelthas.description: When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

EngineGunk_gazlowe.name: Engine Gunk
EngineGunk_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.name: Engulfing Flame
EngulfingFlame_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds, and its radius is increased by 15%.

EnhancedAgility_dehaka.name: Enhanced Agility
EnhancedAgility_dehaka.description: Quest: Each time Dehaka collects 50 Essence, his Brushstalker Movement Speed bonus is permanently increased by 1.5%, up to 15%.

EnoughtoShare_chen.name: Enough to Share
EnoughtoShare_chen.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 56.16 (+4% per level) per second.

Enraged_thebutcher.name: Enraged
Enraged_thebutcher.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

EnragedRegeneration_cho.name: Enraged Regeneration
EnragedRegeneration_cho.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's health regeneration is increased by 200%.

Ensnare_zuljin.name: Ensnare
Ensnare_zuljin.description: Throw a net forward, rooting the first enemy hit for 2 seconds.

Entomb_leoric.name: Entomb
Entomb_leoric.description: Create an unpathable tomb for 4 seconds.

EnvelopingShadows_valeera.name: Enveloping Shadows
EnvelopingShadows_valeera.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

Envenom_kerrigan.name: Envenom
Envenom_kerrigan.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 366.08 (+4% per level) damage over 10 seconds.

EnvenomedNest_abathur.name: Envenomed Nest
EnvenomedNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.name: Envenomed Spikes
EnvenomedSpikes_abathur.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

EnvenomedSpines_zagara.name: Envenomed Spines
EnvenomedSpines_zagara.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 239.2 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

EpicMount_falstad.name: Epic Mount
EpicMount_falstad.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

Epicenter_anubarak.name: Epicenter
Epicenter_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 85% and lowers the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

Epiphany_kharazim.name: Epiphany
Epiphany_kharazim.description: Activate to restore 32.81% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.name: Erik the Swift
EriktheSwift_thelostvikings.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 35.36 (+4% per level) Health per second.

EssofJohan_liming.name: Ess of Johan
EssofJohan_liming.description: When Arcane Orb damages enemies, they are pulled toward it's center.

EssenceClaws_dehaka.name: Essence Claws
EssenceClaws_dehaka.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

EssenceDevourer_dehaka.name: Essence Devourer
EssenceDevourer_dehaka.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence and increases maximum Essence by 1, up to 10. Reward: After collecting 10, Regeneration Globes will instead grant 15 Essence.

EssenceforEssence_kerrigan.name: Essence for Essence
EssenceforEssence_kerrigan.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

EssenceoftheSlain_diablo.name: Essence of the Slain
EssenceoftheSlain_diablo.description: When enemy Minions and Heroes die near you, gain 27.528 (+4% per level) Health and 10 Mana.

EternalHunger_arthas.name: Eternal Hunger
EternalHunger_arthas.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

EternalRetaliation_johanna.name: Eternal Retaliation
EternalRetaliation_johanna.description: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

EvasiveFire_sylvanas.name: Evasive Fire
EvasiveFire_sylvanas.description: When an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

EvasiveShielding_tassadar.name: Evasive Shielding
EvasiveShielding_tassadar.description: The target of your Plasma Shield also gains 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

EvenInDeath_tyrael.name: Even In Death
EvenInDeath_tyrael.description: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

EvolutionComplete_abathur.name: Evolution Complete
EvolutionComplete_abathur.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

EvolutionaryLink_abathur.name: Evolutionary Link
EvolutionaryLink_abathur.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
EvolveMonstrosity_abathur.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 0% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

Executioner_greymane.name: Executioner
Executioner_greymane.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

ExplosiveAttacks_thelostvikings.name: Explosive Attacks
ExplosiveAttacks_thelostvikings.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.name: Explosive Barrier
ExplosiveBarrier_zarya.description: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

ExplosiveRound_nova.name: Explosive Round
ExplosiveRound_nova.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

ExposeArmor_valeera.name: Expose Armor
ExposeArmor_valeera.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

ExpulsionZone_zarya.name: Expulsion Zone
ExpulsionZone_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 128.96 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

ExtendedSpikes_anubarak.name: Extended Spikes
ExtendedSpikes_anubarak.description: Increases Impale's range and damage by 25%.

ExtraTNT_gazlowe.name: Extra TNT
ExtraTNT_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

EyeofKilrogg_gall.name: Eye of Kilrogg
EyeofKilrogg_gall.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 4 charges.

EyeofZuljin_zuljin.name: Eye of Zul'jin
EyeofZuljin_zuljin.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Grievous Throw increases Zul'jin's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

EZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
EZPZDimensionalRipper_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

FaceSmelt_etc.name: Face Smelt
FaceSmelt_etc.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 49.92% fading over 2 seconds.

FallingSword_johanna.name: Falling Sword
FallingSword_johanna.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 379.6 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

Fanaticism_johanna.name: Fanaticism
Fanaticism_johanna.description: While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage.  Stacks up to 40%.

FarflightQuiver_valla.name: Farflight Quiver
FarflightQuiver_valla.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

FarseersBlessing_rehgar.name: Farseer's Blessing
FarseersBlessing_rehgar.description: Increases healing amount by 50%. Allies near the target are healed for 50% of the amount of health regained.

Farsight_rehgar.name: Farsight
Farsight_rehgar.description: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

FastForward_chromie.name: Fast Forward
FastForward_chromie.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

FastReload_nova.name: Fast Reload
FastReload_nova.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

FatalFinesse_valeera.name: Fatal Finesse
FatalFinesse_valeera.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

FavoroftheOldGods_cho.name: Favor of the Old Gods
FavoroftheOldGods_cho.description: Upheaval roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

FealtyUntoDeath_leoric.name: Fealty Unto Death
FealtyUntoDeath_leoric.description: When a nearby Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% of hix maximum Health and 5 Mana. Half as effective while Undying.

FearfulPresence_diablo.name: Fearful Presence
FearfulPresence_diablo.description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

FeedbackLoop_ltmorales.name: Feedback Loop
FeedbackLoop_ltmorales.description: When Safeguard expires, 45 Mana is refunded.

FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.name: Feeding Frenzy
FeedingFrenzy_dehaka.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

FeeltheHeat_zarya.name: Feel the Heat
FeeltheHeat_zarya.description: Zarya's Basic Attack deals -8.84% (+4% per level) additional damage to enemies in melee range.

FeignDeath_rexxar.name: Feign Death
FeignDeath_rexxar.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

FelArmor_guldan.name: Fel Armor
FelArmor_guldan.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

FelInfusion_kaelthas.name: Fel Infusion
FelInfusion_kaelthas.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 97.76 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

FelReach_illidan.name: Fel Reach
FelReach_illidan.description: Increases the range of Sweeping Strike by 20%.

FeralHeart_rehgar.name: Feral Heart
FeralHeart_rehgar.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

FeralLunge_rehgar.name: Feral Lunge
FeralLunge_rehgar.description: While in Ghost Wolf, you lunge a short distance towards your attack target. The damage bonus for Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf is increased from 100% to200%.

FerociousHealing_sonya.name: Ferocious Healing
FerociousHealing_sonya.description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10.15% of Sonya's maximum Health.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

FerociousStalker_dehaka.name: Ferocious Stalker
FerociousStalker_dehaka.description: Brushstalker increases Dehaka's damage by 25% for 10 seconds.

Ferocity_zuljin.name: Ferocity
Ferocity_zuljin.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 35%.

FieryBrand_illidan.name: Fiery Brand
FieryBrand_illidan.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

FifthCircle_azmodan.name: Fifth Circle
FifthCircle_azmodan.description: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

FightorFlight_raynor.name: Fight or Flight
FightorFlight_raynor.description: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates, it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

FinalAssault_thebutcher.name: Final Assault
FinalAssault_thebutcher.description: Increases Ruthless Onslaught's range by 33.333%, and causes you to lunge at the enemy when close to impact.

FireDevil_diablo.name: Fire Devil
FireDevil_diablo.description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20.8 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

FireEater_cho.name: Fire Eater
FireEater_cho.description: Basic Attacks against targets inflicted with Consuming Blaze heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

FireWard_ragnaros.name: Fire Ward
FireWard_ragnaros.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

Fireflies_liming.name: Fireflies
Fireflies_liming.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

FiresofHell_thebutcher.name: Fires of Hell
FiresofHell_thebutcher.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

Firestarter_cho.name: Firestarter
Firestarter_cho.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

Firestorm_diablo.name: Firestorm
Firestorm_diablo.description: Fire Stomp waves return to you, dealing 125% damage.

FirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
FirinMahLazorz_gazlowe.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 142.48 (+4% per level) damage.

FirstAid_sgthammer.name: First Aid
FirstAid_sgthammer.description: Activate to heal 35.49% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

FirstStrike_sgthammer.name: First Strike
FirstStrike_sgthammer.description: Basic Attacks deal 25% more damage if Sgt. Hammer hasn't been attacked within the last 5 seconds.

FishEye_murky.name: Fish Eye
FishEye_murky.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

FishOil_murky.name: Fish Oil
FishOil_murky.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

FishTank_murky.name: Fish Tank
FishTank_murky.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes grant Murky 75 Physical Armor against Heroes for 3 seconds.

FissionBomb_kaelthas.name: Fission Bomb
FissionBomb_kaelthas.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

FistofJustice_uther.name: Fist of Justice
FistofJustice_uther.description: Basic Attacks reduce cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1 second.

FlailAxe_thebutcher.name: Flail Axe
FlailAxe_thebutcher.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.name: Flames of Sulfuron
FlamesofSulfuron_ragnaros.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

Flamethrower_kaelthas.name: Flamethrower
Flamethrower_kaelthas.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

Flare_rexxar.name: Flare
Flare_rexxar.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

FleaBag_stitches.name: Flea Bag
FleaBag_stitches.description: Whenever Stitches is stunned or rooted, his Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 6 seconds.

FlowRider_falstad.name: Flow Rider
FlowRider_falstad.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

FlowingWounds_xul.name: Flowing Wounds
FlowingWounds_xul.description: Reduces Spectral Scythe's cooldown by 5 seconds if an enemy Hero is hit.

FocusFire_tracer.name: Focus Fire
FocusFire_tracer.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 98.28 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 30% of the total magazine.

FocusedAttack_raynor.name: Focused Attack
FocusedAttack_raynor.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

FocusedBeam_tassadar.name: Focused Beam
FocusedBeam_tassadar.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

FocusingDiodes_tychus.name: Focusing Diodes
FocusingDiodes_tychus.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

FollowThrough_artanis.name: Follow Through
FollowThrough_artanis.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

ForceArmor_liming.name: Force Armor
ForceArmor_liming.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

ForceBarrier_tassadar.name: Force Barrier
ForceBarrier_tassadar.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

ForceofWill_artanis.name: Force of Will
ForceofWill_artanis.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

ForceWall_tassadar.name: Force Wall
ForceWall_tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

ForcedRecruitment_azmodan.name: Forced Recruitment
ForcedRecruitment_azmodan.description: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

Foresight_kharazim.name: Foresight
Foresight_kharazim.description: Radiant Dash reveals the area around the target for 3 seconds. Only one area can be revealed at a time.

ForestMedicine_zuljin.name: Forest Medicine
ForestMedicine_zuljin.description: Regeneration no longer has to be channeled, allowing Zul'jin to perform other actions while Regenerating. However, taking damage will still end the effect.

ForestsWrath_lunara.name: Forest's Wrath
ForestsWrath_lunara.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

ForkedLightning_thrall.name: Forked Lightning
ForkedLightning_thrall.description: Allows Chain Lightning to hold 2 charges that can be used in quick succession.

FrenziedFists_cho.name: Frenzied Fists
FrenziedFists_cho.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

Frenzy_varian.name: Frenzy
Frenzy_varian.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

FrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
FrenzyofKalimdor_rexxar.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

FreshCorpses_nazeebo.name: Fresh Corpses
FreshCorpses_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall cooldown reduced by 4 seconds.

FreshestIngredients_chen.name: Freshest Ingredients
FreshestIngredients_chen.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

FriendorFoe_illidan.name: Friend or Foe
FriendorFoe_illidan.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

FrigidWinds_arthas.name: Frigid Winds
FrigidWinds_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest reduces enemy Attack Speed by 8% per second, stacking up to 40%.

FromtheShadows_diablo.name: From the Shadows
FromtheShadows_diablo.description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

FrostArmor_jaina.name: Frost Armor
FrostArmor_jaina.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

FrostPresence_arthas.name: Frost Presence
FrostPresence_arthas.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">30%.undefined Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

FrostShards_jaina.name: Frost Shards
FrostShards_jaina.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

FrostShot_valla.name: Frost Shot
FrostShot_valla.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

FrostStrike_arthas.name: Frost Strike
FrostStrike_arthas.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

Frostbitten_jaina.name: Frostbitten
Frostbitten_jaina.description: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.name: Frostmourne Feeds
FrostmourneFeeds_arthas.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.name: Frostwolf's Grace
FrostwolfsGrace_thrall.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to immediately restore health.

FrozenWastes_arthas.name: Frozen Wastes
FrozenWastes_arthas.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

FuelfortheFlame_cho.name: Fuel for the Flame
FuelfortheFlame_cho.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near Cho increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 0.3%. Quest: Every Hero Takedown increases the amount healed by Consuming Blaze by 3%.

FullKeg_chen.name: Full Keg
FullKeg_chen.description: Increases Keg Smash's damage and radius by 50%.

FullMoonfire_malfurion.name: Full Moonfire
FullMoonfire_malfurion.description: Increases Moonfire's radius by 60% and reduces its Mana cost by 10.

FuriousBlow_sonya.name: Furious Blow
FuriousBlow_sonya.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 50%, but costs 40 Fury.

FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.name: Furnace Blast
FurnaceBlast_thebutcher.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 520 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.name: Fury of the Storm
FuryoftheStorm_nazeebo.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 94.64 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 237.12 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.name: Fury of the Sunwell
FuryoftheSunwell_kaelthas.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.name: Fury of the Swarm
FuryoftheSwarm_kerrigan.description: Kerrgian's Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around the target.

GainTrain_zarya.name: Gain Train
GainTrain_zarya.description: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

GallopingGait_lunara.name: Galloping Gait
GallopingGait_lunara.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

Gargantuan_nazeebo.name: Gargantuan
Gargantuan_nazeebo.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 104 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 182.52 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

GateKeeper_probius.name: Gate Keeper
GateKeeper_probius.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

GatherMinerals_probius.name: Gather Minerals
GatherMinerals_probius.description: Quest:Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 25% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

GatheringRadiance_uther.name: Gathering Radiance
GatheringRadiance_uther.description: Each Hero that Holy Radiance passes through increases the healing and damage of the next Holy Radiance by 8%, to a maximum of 80% increase.

GatheringStorm_falstad.name: Gathering Storm
GatheringStorm_falstad.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.

GetStuffed_tracer.name: Get Stuffed!
GetStuffed_tracer.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

GhastlyReach_leoric.name: Ghastly Reach
GhastlyReach_leoric.description: Increases the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

GhostProtocol_nova.name: Ghost Protocol
GhostProtocol_nova.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Nova's attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

GiantKiller_falstad.name: Giant Killer
GiantKiller_falstad.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

GiantScorcher_gall.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher_gall.description: Shadowflame also does 3.5% of a Hero's maximum Health.

GiantScorcher_ragnaros.name: Giant Scorcher
GiantScorcher_ragnaros.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

GiantsCurse_xul.name: Giant's Curse
GiantsCurse_xul.description: Cursed Strikes deals an additional 2% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

Gidbinn_nazeebo.name: Gidbinn
Gidbinn_nazeebo.description: Increases the duration of your Zombie Wall and Corpse Spiders by 33%.

GiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.name: Gift of the Xel'Naga
GiftoftheXelNaga_zeratul.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

GilneanRoulette_greymane.name: Gilnean Roulette
GilneanRoulette_greymane.description: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

GiveemtheAxe_muradin.name: Give 'em the Axe!
GiveemtheAxe_muradin.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 3 seconds.

GiveMeTwenty_zarya.name: Give Me Twenty
GiveMeTwenty_zarya.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 3 seconds.

GladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.name: Gladiator's War Shout
GladiatorsWarShout_rehgar.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 30.3% of Basic Attack damage done.

GlassCannon_liming.name: Glass Cannon
GlassCannon_liming.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 15%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

GlimmerofHope_auriel.name: Glimmer of Hope
GlimmerofHope_auriel.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 50%.

Gloom_valla.name: Gloom
Gloom_valla.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

GlorytotheAlliance_varian.name: Glory to the Alliance
GlorytotheAlliance_varian.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

GluttonousWard_azmodan.name: Gluttonous Ward
GluttonousWard_azmodan.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3.276% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

Gluttony_azmodan.name: Gluttony
Gluttony_azmodan.description: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

GlyphofDrainLife_guldan.name: Glyph of Drain Life
GlyphofDrainLife_guldan.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

GlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
GlyphOfPolyBomb_medivh.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

GofortheThroat_greymane.name: Go for the Throat
GofortheThroat_greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 369.2 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

GoblinFusion_gazlowe.name: Goblin Fusion
GoblinFusion_gazlowe.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

GoblinRepairs_gazlowe.name: Goblin Repairs
GoblinRepairs_gazlowe.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

Gorge_stitches.name: Gorge
Gorge_stitches.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 284.96 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.  Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

GraceOfAir_thrall.name: Grace Of Air
GraceOfAir_thrall.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

GraduatingRange_sgthammer.name: Graduating Range
GraduatingRange_sgthammer.description: While in Siege Mode, Sgt. Hammer's Attack range increases by 1.1 every 3 seconds, up to 5.5.

GrandSlam_muradin.name: Grand Slam
GrandSlam_muradin.description: Damage of Haymaker increased by 25%, Mana cost lowered by 40, and can store 2 charges.

GravOBomb3000_gazlowe.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
GravOBomb3000_gazlowe.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 261.04 (+4% per level) damage.

GravitonSurge_zarya.name: Graviton Surge
GravitonSurge_zarya.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

GravitonVortex_artanis.name: Graviton Vortex
GravitonVortex_artanis.description: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first, and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

GravityCrush_kaelthas.name: Gravity Crush
GravityCrush_kaelthas.description: Gravity Lapse causes enemies to take 25% additional damage from Kael'thas for 4 seconds.

GravityKills_zarya.name: Gravity Kills
GravityKills_zarya.description: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 145.6 (+4% per level) damage over the duration.

GravityThrow_kaelthas.name: Gravity Throw
GravityThrow_kaelthas.description: Increases the duration of Gravity Lapse's stun by 33% and causes it to instantly destroy Minions.

GravityWell_probius.name: Gravity Well
GravityWell_probius.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

GreaterCleave_zeratul.name: Greater Cleave
GreaterCleave_zeratul.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.name: Greater Polymorph
GreaterPolymorph_brightwing.description: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

GreaterSpellShield_lunara.name: Greater Spell Shield
GreaterSpellShield_lunara.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

Grenadier_zarya.name: Grenadier
Grenadier_zarya.description: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

GrimTask_zeratul.name: Grim Task
GrimTask_zeratul.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Spell Power by 5%, up to 50% . This bonus Spell Power is lost on death.

GrizzledBear_rexxar.name: Grizzled Bear
GrizzledBear_rexxar.description: Every 5 seconds, Misha gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

GrizzledFortitude_rexxar.name: Grizzled Fortitude
GrizzledFortitude_rexxar.description: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

GroovedSpines_zagara.name: Grooved Spines
GroovedSpines_zagara.description: Hunter Killer has its range increased by 35% and damage increased by 20%.

GroundingBrew_chen.name: Grounding Brew
GroundingBrew_chen.description: Fortifying Brew grants 30 Spell Armor while drinking, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

Groupies_etc.name: Groupies
Groupies_etc.description: Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 68.64 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

GuardianofTirisfal_medivh.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
