GuardianofTirisfal_medivh.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

GuardianToads_nazeebo.name: Guardian Toads
GuardianToads_nazeebo.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

Guillotine_zuljin.name: Guillotine
Guillotine_zuljin.description: After 0.5 seconds, Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 218.4 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

GuitarHero_etc.name: Guitar Hero
GuitarHero_etc.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 35% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Also increases the Attack Speed bonus of Rockstar by5%.

HammerGains_falstad.name: Hammer Gains
HammerGains_falstad.description: Basic Attacks heal for 0% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

HammerofTwilight_cho.name: Hammer of Twilight
HammerofTwilight_cho.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 156.75 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

HammerTime_falstad.name: Hammer Time
HammerTime_falstad.description: Your first Basic Attack against a target slowed by Hammerang will stun them for 0.75 seconds.

Hammeron_etc.name: Hammer-on
Hammeron_etc.description: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage.

HamstringShot_raynor.name: Hamstring Shot
HamstringShot_raynor.description: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.name: Hand of Ragnaros
HandofRagnaros_ragnaros.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

HardStyle_lucio.name: Hard Style

If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">4 second cooldown. 
Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

LastLaugh_alarak.name: Last Laugh
LastLaugh_alarak.description: Activate to remove all roots, slows, and damage over time effects and teleport to the chosen location. Activating Last Laugh will immediately reduce Alarak's Health to 1.

LavaSurge_ragnaros.name: Lava Surge
LavaSurge_ragnaros.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

LavaWave_ragnaros.name: Lava Wave
LavaWave_ragnaros.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 249.6 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

LawsofHope_johanna.name: Laws of Hope
LawsofHope_johanna.description: Activate to heal 20% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 10.4 (+4% per level) Health per second.

LeadRain_tychus.name: Lead Rain
LeadRain_tychus.description: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

LeadenOrb_gall.name: Leaden Orb
LeadenOrb_gall.description: Dread Orb stuns enemy Heroes for 0.5 seconds.

Leap_sonya.name: Leap
Leap_sonya.description: Leap into the air, dealing 140.4 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

LeapingSpiders_nazeebo.name: Leaping Spiders
LeapingSpiders_nazeebo.description: Corpse Spiders leap at their targets and deal 15% more damage.

LeapingStrike_lunara.name: Leaping Strike
LeapingStrike_lunara.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 281.84 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

LeechingPlasma_tassadar.name: Leeching Plasma
LeechingPlasma_tassadar.description: While Plasma Shield is active, 30% of the target's Basic Attack damage against the primary target is returned as Health.

LeechingRounds_tracer.name: Leeching Rounds
LeechingRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

LeechingScarabs_anubarak.name: Leeching Scarabs
LeechingScarabs_anubarak.description: Beetles gain 20% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

LegionofBeetles_anubarak.name: Legion of Beetles
LegionofBeetles_anubarak.description: Automatically spawn a Beetle every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

LegionofNorthrend_arthas.name: Legion of Northrend
LegionofNorthrend_arthas.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.name: Let the Killing Begin
LettheKillingBegin_zuljin.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 6%, up to 30%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 30% Attack Speed.

LetThemWither_lunara.name: Let Them Wither
LetThemWither_lunara.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

LethalAlacrity_artanis.name: Lethal Alacrity
LethalAlacrity_artanis.description: Increases Blade Dash range and speed by 30%.

LethalBlast_sgthammer.name: Lethal Blast
LethalBlast_sgthammer.description: Increase the damage of Concussive Blast by 50%.

LethalDecoy_nova.name: Lethal Decoy
LethalDecoy_nova.description: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

LeyLineSeal_medivh.name: Ley Line Seal
LeyLineSeal_medivh.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

LifeDrain_sylvanas.name: Life Drain
LifeDrain_sylvanas.description: Shadow Dagger heals Sylvanas for 38.48 (+4% per level) each time it spreads to an enemy.

LifeFunnel_sonya.name: Life Funnel
LifeFunnel_sonya.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

LifeLeech_diablo.name: Life Leech
LifeLeech_diablo.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Diablo for the same amount.

LifeSeed_malfurion.name: Life Seed
LifeSeed_malfurion.description: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

LightSpeed_auriel.name: Light Speed
LightSpeed_auriel.description: Increases the healing of Resurrect to 100% of the ally's maximum Health, and they also gain 199.68% increased Movement Speed that decays over 4 seconds.

LightningBond_rehgar.name: Lightning Bond
LightningBond_rehgar.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.

LightningBreath_diablo.name: Lightning Breath
LightningBreath_diablo.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 832 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

LightningSerpent_lili.name: Lightning Serpent
LightningSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing 15.6 (+4% per level) damage each.

LingeringApparition_leoric.name: Lingering Apparition
LingeringApparition_leoric.description: Increases the duration of Wraith Walk by 80%.

LingeringBlind_lili.name: Lingering Blind
LingeringBlind_lili.description: Increases the duration of Blinding Wind by 50%.

LingeringChill_jaina.name: Lingering Chill
LingeringChill_jaina.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

LingeringEssence_kerrigan.name: Lingering Essence
LingeringEssence_kerrigan.description: Increases Assimilation Shield's duration to 20 seconds.

LionsMaw_varian.name: Lion's Maw
LionsMaw_varian.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

LivebytheSword_varian.name: Live by the Sword
LivebytheSword_varian.description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If at least 2 Hero Basic Attacks are blocked with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

LivingtheDream_murky.name: Living the Dream
LivingtheDream_murky.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

LockandLoad_tychus.name: Lock and Load
LockandLoad_tychus.description: While the Minigun is wound up, gain 15.00% increased Move Speed.

LockedandLoaded_tracer.name: Locked and Loaded
LockedandLoaded_tracer.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

LocustBrood_abathur.name: Locust Brood
LocustBrood_abathur.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

LocustNeedles_anubarak.name: Locust Needles
LocustNeedles_anubarak.description: Basic Attacks deal 60% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

LocustNest_abathur.name: Locust Nest
LocustNest_abathur.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

LocustSwarm_anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
LocustSwarm_anubarak.description: Deal 62.4 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 17.68 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.name: Longboat Raid!
LongboatRaid_thelostvikings.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 116.48 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 213.2 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

Longshot_nova.name: Longshot
Longshot_nova.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

Loophole_chromie.name: Loophole
Loophole_chromie.description: Temporal Loop hits all enemy Heroes near the initial target.

LordofTerror_diablo.name: Lord of Terror
LordofTerror_diablo.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

LostSoul_sylvanas.name: Lost Soul
LostSoul_sylvanas.description: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1.25 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

LoudSpeakers_etc.name: Loud Speakers
LoudSpeakers_etc.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

LunarBlaze_tyrande.name: Lunar Blaze
LunarBlaze_tyrande.description: Increases the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

LunarMomentum_tyrande.name: Lunar Momentum
LunarMomentum_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks reduce Tyrande's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

LunarShower_malfurion.name: Lunar Shower
LunarShower_malfurion.description: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of the next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

Lunge_illidan.name: Lunge
Lunge_illidan.description: Increases the range of Dive by 30%.

LurkerStrain_dehaka.name: Lurker Strain
LurkerStrain_dehaka.description: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

Maelstrom_kerrigan.name: Maelstrom
Maelstrom_kerrigan.description: Deals 76.96 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

MaelstromShells_sgthammer.name: Maelstrom Shells
MaelstromShells_sgthammer.description: Increase standard Basic Attack range by 20%.

MageArmor_medivh.name: Mage Armor
MageArmor_medivh.description: The first time an Ally uses a Portal, they gain 50 Physical Armor against the next 3 enemy Heroic Basic Attacks for 5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

MajesticSpan_auriel.name: Majestic Span
MajesticSpan_auriel.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

MakingInky_murky.name: Making Inky
MakingInky_murky.description: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

ManaAddict_kaelthas.name: Mana Addict
ManaAddict_kaelthas.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

ManaAdept_medivh.name: Mana Adept
ManaAdept_medivh.description: Increases Arcane Rift's Mana refund for hitting enemy Heroes by 100%.

ManaTap_kaelthas.name: Mana Tap
ManaTap_kaelthas.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 3.9% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

ManaThirst_leoric.name: Mana Thirst
ManaThirst_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

ManicPixie_brightwing.name: Manic Pixie
ManicPixie_brightwing.description: When Soothing Mist heals an ally with Pixie Dust on them, they heal for an additional 108.16 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

Manticore_valla.name: Manticore
Manticore_valla.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

MarchofSin_azmodan.name: March of Sin
MarchofSin_azmodan.description: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

MarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.name: March of the Black King
MarchoftheBlackKing_leoric.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and swings his mace three times, healing himself for 7.03% of his maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 190.32 (+4% per level) damage.

MarchoftheMurlocs_murky.name: March of the Murlocs
MarchoftheMurlocs_murky.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 130 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

MarkofMending_tyrande.name: Mark of Mending
MarkofMending_tyrande.description: Basic Attacks against Marked targets heal for 2.5% maximum Health.

MarkedforDeath_illidan.name: Marked for Death
MarkedforDeath_illidan.description: Dive deals an extra 187.2 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

MarkedfortheKill_greymane.name: Marked for the Kill
MarkedfortheKill_greymane.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 197.6 (+4% per level) damage. For 5 seconds, their Armor is lowered by 25, taking 25% more damage. Each time Greymane damages the Marked Hero, the duration is refreshed.

MassVortex_lili.name: Mass Vortex
MassVortex_lili.description: Increases the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 4.

MasterAssassin_tychus.name: Master Assassin
MasterAssassin_tychus.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

MasteratArms_varian.name: Master at Arms
MasteratArms_varian.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

MasterofDestruction_azmodan.name: Master of Destruction
MasterofDestruction_azmodan.description: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by <d ref="(Effect,AzmodanAllShallBurnMasterofDestructionTalentModifyPlayer,EffectArray[0].Value/(Abil,AzmodanAllShallBurn,Range + Abil,AzmodanAllShallBurn,RangeSlop + Unit,HeroAzmodan,Radius))*100" precision="01"/>, to a maximum of 17.368%.

MasterofFlames_kaelthas.name: Master of Flames
MasterofFlames_kaelthas.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.name: Master Warp-Blade
MasterWarpBlade_zeratul.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

MaximumCharge_zarya.name: Maximum Charge
MaximumCharge_zarya.description: Regen Globes now instantly grant 15 Energy. Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy. Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

MaximumTempo_lucio.name: Maximum Tempo
MaximumTempo_lucio.description: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Crossfade's Speed Boost is active. Reward: Permanently increase the Amp It Up bonus for Crossfade's Speed Boost to 60%.

MeatShield_thebutcher.name: Meat Shield
MeatShield_thebutcher.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

MechaLord_gazlowe.name: Mecha-Lord
MechaLord_gazlowe.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

Medbay_ltmorales.name: Medbay
Medbay_ltmorales.description: Medivac heals nearby allies and everyone aboard for 142.48 (+4% per level) Health per second.

MedivacDropship_ltmorales.name: Medivac Dropship
MedivacDropship_ltmorales.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10.5 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

MedivhCheats_medivh.name: Medivh Cheats!
MedivhCheats_medivh.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33.333% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

MedusaBlades_zagara.name: Medusa Blades
MedusaBlades_zagara.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

MegaSmash_stitches.name: Mega Smash
MegaSmash_stitches.description: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

MeltingPoint_tychus.name: Melting Point
MeltingPoint_tychus.description: Frag Grenade deals an additional 384.80 (+4% per level) damage over 10 seconds to Minions and Structures.

MendingSerpent_lili.name: Mending Serpent
MendingSerpent_lili.description: Cloud Serpent heals the friendly unit for 22.88 (+4% per level) Health each time it attacks.

MendingStrikes_zeratul.name: Mending Strikes
MendingStrikes_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

MentalAcuity_tassadar.name: Mental Acuity
MentalAcuity_tassadar.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. undefinedReward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by -98.5%.

MercenaryLord_sonya.name: Mercenary Lord
MercenaryLord_sonya.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

MercenaryQueen_sylvanas.name: Mercenary Queen
MercenaryQueen_sylvanas.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage.

MercilessStrikes_samuro.name: Merciless Strikes
MercilessStrikes_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

MetabolicBoost_zagara.name: Metabolic Boost
MetabolicBoost_zagara.description: Movement Speed boost on Creep increased to 40%.

Metamorphosis_illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Metamorphosis_illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 47.84 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 208 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

MeteorBomb_ragnaros.name: Meteor Bomb
MeteorBomb_ragnaros.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 228.8 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

MicCheck_etc.name: Mic Check
MicCheck_etc.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

MightyGust_falstad.name: Mighty Gust
MightyGust_falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

MindControl_sylvanas.name: Mind Control
MindControl_sylvanas.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

MineField_sgthammer.name: Mine Field
MineField_sgthammer.description: Increase the number of mines by 2.

MiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.name: Miniature Black Hole
MiniatureBlackHole_gazlowe.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

Mirage_samuro.name: Mirage
Mirage_samuro.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

Mirrorball_liming.name: Mirrorball
Mirrorball_liming.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

MirroredSteel_samuro.name: Mirrored Steel
MirroredSteel_samuro.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

Mistified_brightwing.name: Mistified
Mistified_brightwing.description: Reduces the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 0.5 seconds every time Brightwing casts a Basic Ability.

MobiusLoop_chromie.name: Mobius Loop
MobiusLoop_chromie.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

MoltenBlock_cho.name: Molten Block
MoltenBlock_cho.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 95.68 (+4% per level) damage per second.

MoltenPower_ragnaros.name: Molten Power
MoltenPower_ragnaros.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 15%, up to a maximum of 15%.

MonsterHunter_valla.name: Monster Hunter
MonsterHunter_valla.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

Moonburn_malfurion.name: Moonburn
Moonburn_malfurion.description: Increases Moonfire's damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 75%.

MortalStrike_varian.name: Mortal Strike
MortalStrike_varian.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

MortalWound_xul.name: Mortal Wound
MortalWound_xul.description: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

MoshPit_etc.name: Mosh Pit
MoshPit_etc.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

Mutalisk_zagara.name: Mutalisk
Mutalisk_zagara.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 45 seconds.

Mutilate_valeera.name: Mutilate
Mutilate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

MysticalSpear_sonya.name: Mystical Spear
MysticalSpear_sonya.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 3 seconds. Sonya is pulled to the target location even if an enemy isn't hit.

NapalmStrike_sgthammer.name: Napalm Strike
NapalmStrike_sgthammer.description: Deals 170.56 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 52 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

NaturalPerspective_lunara.name: Natural Perspective
NaturalPerspective_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

NaturesCulling_lunara.name: Nature's Culling
NaturesCulling_lunara.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

Needlespine_abathur.name: Needlespine
Needlespine_abathur.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

NegativelyCharged_alarak.name: Negatively Charged
NegativelyCharged_alarak.description: Increases damage dealt to enemies between Alarak and his victim of Lightning Surge by 100%, but does not generate any additional healing.

NeosteelCoating_tychus.name: Neosteel Coating
NeosteelCoating_tychus.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

NerazimFury_zeratul.name: Nerazim Fury
NerazimFury_zeratul.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

NerubianArmor_anubarak.name: Nerubian Armor
NerubianArmor_anubarak.description: Every 8 seconds, gain 30 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 30%.

NervesofSteel_sonya.name: Nerves of Steel
NervesofSteel_sonya.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

NetherWind_kaelthas.name: Nether Wind
NetherWind_kaelthas.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

NetworkedCarapace_abathur.name: Networked Carapace
NetworkedCarapace_abathur.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

NeverEndingMurlocs_murky.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
NeverEndingMurlocs_murky.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely

NexusBlades_artanis.name: Nexus Blades
NexusBlades_artanis.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

NexusFrenzy_falstad.name: Nexus Frenzy
NexusFrenzy_falstad.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

Nightmare_malfurion.name: Nightmare
Nightmare_malfurion.description: Increases Twilight Dream's silence duration to 4 seconds and it also slows enemies by 50%.

Nightslayer_valeera.name: Nightslayer
Nightslayer_valeera.description: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.

NimbleDefender_illidan.name: Nimble Defender
NimbleDefender_illidan.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

NimbleWisp_lunara.name: Nimble Wisp
NimbleWisp_lunara.description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

NoEscape_sonya.name: No Escape
NoEscape_sonya.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

NonstopRemix_lucio.name: Nonstop Remix
NonstopRemix_lucio.description: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.name: Nordic Attack Squad
NordicAttackSquad_thelostvikings.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

NorseForce_thelostvikings.name: Norse Force!
NorseForce_thelostvikings.description: All Vikings gain a 114.4 (+4% per level) to 228.8 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

NorthernExposure_jaina.name: Northern Exposure
NorthernExposure_jaina.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

NowheretoHide_illidan.name: Nowhere to Hide
NowheretoHide_illidan.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

NullGate_probius.name: Null Gate
NullGate_probius.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 66.56 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

Nullification_tassadar.name: Nullification
Nullification_tassadar.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals  by 75% for 4 seconds.

NullificationShield_anubarak.name: Nullification Shield
NullificationShield_anubarak.description: Activate to gain 60 Spell Armor for 5 seconds.

NumbingBlast_jaina.name: Numbing Blast
NumbingBlast_jaina.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

NumbingEruption_dehaka.name: Numbing Eruption
NumbingEruption_dehaka.description: Emerging from Burrow knocks nearby enemies back and slows them by 30% for 2 seconds.

NydusNetwork_zagara.name: Nydus Network
NydusNetwork_zagara.description:
Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. 
Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.
Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .75 seconds.

Obliterate_arthas.name: Obliterate
Obliterate_arthas.description: Frostmourne Hungers also hits enemies near the target for 50% damage.

OctoGrab_murky.name: Octo-Grab
OctoGrab_murky.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.063 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

OfftheWall_lucio.name: Off the Wall
OfftheWall_lucio.description: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

OgreRampage_gall.name: Ogre Rampage
OgreRampage_gall.description: Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

OlaftheStout_thelostvikings.name: Olaf the Stout

ReactiveParry_artanis.description: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ReactiveSpark_rehgar.name: Reactive Spark
ReactiveSpark_rehgar.description: Reduces Lightning Shield's cooldown by 3 seconds and the duration does not start until an enemy is nearby.

Reanimation_leoric.name: Reanimation
Reanimation_leoric.description: Leoric can gather Regeneration Globes while Undying. Quest:  Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Leoric's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Globes, Leoric always respawns 10 seconds faster.

Rebirth_kaelthas.name: Rebirth
Rebirth_kaelthas.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

Reciprocate_tyrael.name: Reciprocate
Reciprocate_tyrael.description: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 176.8 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

RecklessStrike_alarak.name: Reckless Strike
RecklessStrike_alarak.description: Reduces the delay of Discord Strike by 0.25 seconds but if it hits an enemy, Alarak's Armor is lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, causing him to take 25% more damage.

Recklessness_zuljin.name: Recklessness
Recklessness_zuljin.description: While Zul'jin is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 25%.

Reconstitution_zagara.name: Reconstitution
Reconstitution_zagara.description: Health Restoration bonus on Creep increased by 200%.

Redemption_uther.name: Redemption
Redemption_uther.description: After Eternal Devotion ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

ReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
ReduceReuseRecycle_gazlowe.description: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

ReflexiveBlock_illidan.name: Reflexive Block
ReflexiveBlock_illidan.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

RefreshingElixir_chen.name: Refreshing Elixir
RefreshingElixir_chen.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%, or by 60% while drinking Fortifying Brew.

RegenerationMaster_anubarak.name: Regeneration Master
RegenerationMaster_anubarak.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 0 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

RegenerativeBile_stitches.name: Regenerative Bile
RegenerativeBile_stitches.description: Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer, grants an additional 10% Movement Speed and heals for 51.635% (+4% per level) of the damage dealt.

RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.name: Regenerative Microbes
RegenerativeMicrobes_abathur.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 70.72 (+4% per level) Health per second over 4 seconds.

Reinforce_johanna.name: Reinforce
Reinforce_johanna.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ReinforceStructure_tassadar.name: Reinforce Structure
ReinforceStructure_tassadar.description: Plasma Shield is 100% stronger and lasts 100% longer when cast on Structures.

RejuvenatingBubble_murky.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
RejuvenatingBubble_murky.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

Rejuvenescencia_lucio.name: Rejuvenescência
Rejuvenescencia_lucio.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 3.2% of the target's maximum health each second.

RelentlessLeader_raynor.name: Relentless Leader
RelentlessLeader_raynor.description:
Being Stunned or Rooted knocks away nearby enemies.  This effect has a 8 second cooldown. 
Passive: The cooldown of Adrenaline Rush is reduced by 15 seconds.

RelentlessPredator_greymane.name: Relentless Predator
RelentlessPredator_greymane.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 75% while in Worgen form.

RelentlessSoldier_tychus.name: Relentless Soldier
RelentlessSoldier_tychus.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

RelentlessStrikes_valeera.name: Relentless Strikes
RelentlessStrikes_valeera.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

Remorseless_sylvanas.name: Remorseless
Remorseless_sylvanas.description: After using an Ability, Sylvanas's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

RemorselessWinter_arthas.name: Remorseless Winter
RemorselessWinter_arthas.description: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

RemoteDelivery_nova.name: Remote Delivery
RemoteDelivery_nova.description: Increases Holo Decoy cast range by 100% and its sight range by 50%

RendingCleave_zeratul.name: Rending Cleave
RendingCleave_zeratul.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

RenewedSwing_leoric.name: Renewed Swing
RenewedSwing_leoric.description: Skeletal Swing can be recast again for free within 3 seconds for 83.2% (+4% per level) damage.

RepeatedOffense_auriel.name: Repeated Offense
RepeatedOffense_auriel.description: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 200.

RepeatingArrow_valla.name: Repeating Arrow
RepeatingArrow_valla.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

RepellingStrike_auriel.name: Repelling Strike
RepellingStrike_auriel.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

Repulsion_liming.name: Repulsion
Repulsion_liming.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

Repulsor_probius.name: Repulsor
Repulsor_probius.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

ReservoirofHope_auriel.name: Reservoir of Hope
ReservoirofHope_auriel.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

ResilientFlame_ragnaros.name: Resilient Flame
ResilientFlame_ragnaros.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

Resistant_sgthammer.name: Resistant
Resistant_sgthammer.description: Being Stunned or Rooted while in Siege Mode grants 50 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

Resonation_tassadar.name: Resonation
Resonation_tassadar.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

RestlessWolves_thrall.name: Restless Wolves
RestlessWolves_thrall.description: If Feral Spirit hits an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

RestorativeFumes_stitches.name: Restorative Fumes
RestorativeFumes_stitches.description: Whenever Vile Gas damages an enemy Hero, Stitches is healed for 28.08 (+4% per level) Health.

Resurrect_auriel.name: Resurrect
Resurrect_auriel.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 3 seconds, bringing them back to life with 50% of their maximum health at the location where they died.

Retribution_tyrael.name: Retribution
Retribution_tyrael.description: Cooldown is lowered by 0.5 seconds for each target hit by Smite.

Reverberation_muradin.name: Reverberation
Reverberation_muradin.description: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3 seconds.

ReverseAmp_lucio.name: Reverse Amp
ReverseAmp_lucio.description:
Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 to inflict 116.48 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. 
Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4.063 seconds.

RevitalizingMist_brightwing.name: Revitalizing Mist
RevitalizingMist_brightwing.description: Healing another Hero with Soothing Mist increases their healing received from Soothing Mist by 25% for 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

RevolutionOverdrive_raynor.name: Revolution Overdrive
RevolutionOverdrive_raynor.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

Rewind_anubarak.name: Rewind
Rewind_anubarak.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

Ricochet_tracer.name: Ricochet
Ricochet_tracer.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

RideTheLightning_thrall.name: Ride The Lightning
RideTheLightning_thrall.description: Chain Lightning can hit 2 additional enemies for 92.56 (+4% per level) damage.

RideTheWind_thrall.name: Ride The Wind
RideTheWind_thrall.description: Increases Windfury's Movement Speed bonus from 30% to 40%. Windfury attacks increase the Movement Speed duration by 1 second.

RiftShock_probius.name: Rift Shock
RiftShock_probius.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

RighteousAssault_auriel.name: Righteous Assault
RighteousAssault_auriel.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 2 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center, up to a total of 4 seconds.

RighteousDefense_uther.name: Righteous Defense
RighteousDefense_uther.description: Healing a Hero with Holy Light grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing all damage they take by 50%.

RighteousSmash_johanna.name: Righteous Smash
RighteousSmash_johanna.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

Rime_arthas.name: Rime
Rime_arthas.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%. Stores up to 3 charges.

RingofFire_chen.name: Ring of Fire
RingofFire_chen.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 54.08 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

RingofFrost_jaina.name: Ring of Frost
RingofFrost_jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 322.4 (+4% per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

RingofPoison_nazeebo.name: Ring of Poison
RingofPoison_nazeebo.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 331.5 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

RisingDread_gall.name: Rising Dread
RisingDread_gall.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

RisingStorm_rehgar.name: Rising Storm
RisingStorm_rehgar.description: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

RoboGoblin_gazlowe.name: Robo-Goblin
RoboGoblin_gazlowe.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

RockItTurretXL_gazlowe.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
RockItTurretXL_gazlowe.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

Rollback_cho.name: Rollback
Rollback_cho.description: Rune Bomb continues to travel after detonation, and will roll back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

RollingThunder_thrall.name: Rolling Thunder
RollingThunder_thrall.description: Increases Chain Lightning's range by 30% and attacking enemies recently hit by Chain Lightning restores 10 Mana.

RoyalFocus_leoric.name: Royal Focus
RoyalFocus_leoric.description: If Leoric's body takes no damage during Wraith Walk's duration, the cooldown is reduced to 4 seconds. Wraith Walk also increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%.

RuinousAffliction_guldan.name: Ruinous Affliction
RuinousAffliction_guldan.description: Corruption deals an additional 81.12 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 242.32 (+4% per level) damage.

RuneTap_arthas.name: Rune Tap
RuneTap_arthas.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 3.9% of his max Health.

RunedGauntlet_cho.name: Runed Gauntlet
RunedGauntlet_cho.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 0.75 seconds.

RunicFeedback_cho.name: Runic Feedback
RunicFeedback_cho.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 seconds per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

RunicPersistence_gall.name: Runic Persistence
RunicPersistence_gall.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 187.2 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

RunningWild_greymane.name: Running Wild
RunningWild_greymane.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

Rupture_valeera.name: Rupture
Rupture_valeera.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks increase the damage over time effect of Garrote by 5%, stacking up to 30%, and refresh the duration.

SafetySprint_lili.name: Safety Sprint
SafetySprint_lili.description: Increases Fast Feet's Movement Speed bonus from 10% to 20%.

Salvation_tyrael.name: Salvation
Salvation_tyrael.description: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 45%.

Sanctification_tyrael.name: Sanctification
Sanctification_tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

SavageCharge_thebutcher.name: Savage Charge
SavageCharge_thebutcher.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

SavortheFlavor_stitches.name: Savor the Flavor
SavortheFlavor_stitches.description: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

ScentedTincture_greymane.name: Scented Tincture
ScentedTincture_greymane.description: Gilnean Cocktail reveals enemy Heroes for 10 seconds.

ScorchedEarth_raynor.name: Scorched Earth
ScorchedEarth_raynor.description: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 41.6 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

ScoutingDrone_ltmorales.name: Scouting Drone
ScoutingDrone_ltmorales.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

ScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
ScrapoMaticSmelter_gazlowe.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

Scryer_tassadar.name: Scryer
Scryer_tassadar.description: Oracle duration increased by 3 seconds and grants 20% increased Movement Speed.

SealFate_valeera.name: Seal Fate
SealFate_valeera.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

SearedFlesh_cho.name: Seared Flesh
SearedFlesh_cho.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

SearingArrows_tyrande.name: Searing Arrows
SearingArrows_tyrande.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds.  Each attack costs 10 Mana.

SearingLight_auriel.name: Searing Light
SearingLight_auriel.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

SearingShadows_gall.name: Searing Shadows
SearingShadows_gall.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

SeasonedMarksman_artanis.name: Seasoned Marksman
SeasonedMarksman_artanis.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

SecondOpinion_ltmorales.name: Second Opinion
SecondOpinion_ltmorales.description: Reduces Displacement Grenade's cooldown by 2 seconds and it now holds a second charge.

SecondStrike_tassadar.name: Second Strike
SecondStrike_tassadar.description: After casting Psionic Storm, you may cast Psionic Storm again for free within 3 seconds. The damage does not stack.

SecondSweep_illidan.name: Second Sweep
SecondSweep_illidan.description: Store up to 2 charges of Sweeping Strike.

SecondWind_varian.name: Second Wind
SecondWind_varian.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1.17% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

SecretWeapon_falstad.name: Secret Weapon
SecretWeapon_falstad.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

Seeker_liming.name: Seeker
Seeker_liming.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 130 (+4% per level) damage.

SeekerintheDark_zeratul.name: Seeker in the Dark
SeekerintheDark_zeratul.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

SeethingHatred_valla.name: Seething Hatred
SeethingHatred_valla.description: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.name: Sentenced to Death
SentencedtoDeath_zeratul.description: Deal 50% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

Serenity_malfurion.name: Serenity
Serenity_malfurion.description: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

SerpentSidekick_lili.name: Serpent Sidekick
SerpentSidekick_lili.description: Li Li also gains a Cloud Serpent whenever it is cast on another ally.

SerratedSpines_zagara.name: Serrated Spines
SerratedSpines_zagara.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.name: Seven-Sided Strike
SevenSidedStrike_kharazim.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.813 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

Shackler_xul.name: Shackler
Shackler_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are slowed by 35% for 1 second.

Shade_xul.name: Shade
Shade_xul.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

ShadeForm_sylvanas.name: Shade Form
ShadeForm_sylvanas.description: Haunting Wave grants Stealth for 3 seconds. Activating the teleport does not break the Stealth.

ShadowAssault_zeratul.name: Shadow Assault
ShadowAssault_zeratul.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

ShadowBoltVolley_gall.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
ShadowBoltVolley_gall.description: After 1 second, unleash 19.375 Shadow Bolts over 3.875 seconds, each dealing 90.48 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

ShadowHunter_zeratul.name: Shadow Hunter
ShadowHunter_zeratul.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2. Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

ShadowShield_illidan.name: Shadow Shield
ShadowShield_illidan.description: Evasion grants a 148.72 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

ShadowSpike_zeratul.name: Shadow Spike
ShadowSpike_zeratul.description: No longer decloak when using Singularity Spike. Range increased by 20%.

ShadowWolf_rehgar.name: Shadow Wolf
ShadowWolf_rehgar.description: When entering Ghost Wolf, you are Stealthed for 4.13 seconds.

Shadowflare_gall.name: Shadowflare
Shadowflare_gall.description: Increases Shadowflame's width by 50%. Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

Shadowfury_gall.name: Shadowfury
Shadowfury_gall.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

Shadowsnare_gall.name: Shadowsnare
Shadowsnare_gall.description: Shadowflame slows enemy Heroes by 10% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

Shadowstalk_tyrande.name: Shadowstalk
Shadowstalk_tyrande.description: Stealth all allied Heroes and heal them for 249.6 (+4% per level) over 8 seconds.  At the conclusion of Shadowstalk, they receive a burst of 98.8 (+4% per level) healing.

ShakeItOff_lili.name: Shake It Off
ShakeItOff_lili.description: Being Stunned or Rooted gives 50 Armor, reducing the damage taken by 50% for 4 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

ShatteredArmor_arthas.name: Shattered Armor
ShatteredArmor_arthas.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

ShatteredGround_sonya.name: Shattered Ground
ShatteredGround_sonya.description: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

ShatteringThrow_varian.name: Shattering Throw
ShatteringThrow_varian.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 52 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1456 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus damage to Shields.

ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.name: Shed Exoskeleton
ShedExoskeleton_anubarak.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

ShieldBattery_probius.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_probius.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 27.04 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 108.16 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 4.25 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

ShieldBattery_tassadar.name: Shield Battery
ShieldBattery_tassadar.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

ShieldCapacitor_probius.name: Shield Capacitor
ShieldCapacitor_probius.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10.4% (+4% per level) of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

ShieldDust_brightwing.name: Shield Dust
ShieldDust_brightwing.description: Pixie Dust grants 40 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 40%.

ShieldofHope_auriel.name: Shield of Hope
ShieldofHope_auriel.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

ShieldSequencer_ltmorales.name: Shield Sequencer
ShieldSequencer_ltmorales.description: After casting Safeguard, it can be cast a second time within 3 seconds at no cost.

ShieldSurge_artanis.name: Shield Surge
ShieldSurge_artanis.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 78% (+4% per level) while below 25% Health.

ShieldWall_varian.name: Shield Wall
ShieldWall_varian.description: Parry now grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage for the duration.

ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.name: Shifting Meteor
ShiftingMeteor_ragnaros.description: Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and the Ability can be recast to change its direction once per cast.

ShiftingNether_gall.name: Shifting Nether
ShiftingNether_gall.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins channeling.

ShiftingSands_chromie.name: Shifting Sands
ShiftingSands_chromie.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast increases Chromie's Ability Power by 8% for the next 10 seconds. This bonus can be stacked up to 40%, and the duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

ShishKabob_stitches.name: Shish Kabob
ShishKabob_stitches.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

ShootEmUp_probius.name: Shoot 'Em Up
ShootEmUp_probius.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal -49% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

ShootingStar_tyrande.name: Shooting Star
ShootingStar_tyrande.description: Lunar Flare does 50% more damage. Hitting an enemy Hero will also refund the Mana cost.

ShotofFury_sonya.name: Shot of Fury
ShotofFury_sonya.description: Increases maximum Fury by 50. Sonya's Trait can be activated to gain 50 Fury.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

Shove_gall.name: Shove
Shove_gall.description: Nudge Cho a small distance in the direction you choose.

ShowStopper_etc.name: Show Stopper
ShowStopper_etc.description: After using Powerslide, gain 25 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 25%.

ShredderGrenade_tychus.name: Shredder Grenade
ShredderGrenade_tychus.description: Increases the explosion radius of Frag Grenade by 25%.

ShrinkRay_lili.name: Shrink Ray
ShrinkRay_lili.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

ShroudofAdun_zeratul.name: Shroud of Adun
ShroudofAdun_zeratul.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

ShrugItOff_tychus.name: Shrug It Off
ShrugItOff_tychus.description: Run and Gun grants Resistant for 3 seconds, reducing the damage you take by 25%.

Shukuchi_samuro.name: Shukuchi
Shukuchi_samuro.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

SiegingWrath_azmodan.name: Sieging Wrath
SiegingWrath_azmodan.description: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 4, up to 100. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

SinforSin_azmodan.name: Sin for Sin
SinforSin_azmodan.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

SinsGrasp_azmodan.name: Sin's Grasp
SinsGrasp_azmodan.description: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 257.4 (+4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

SinsExposed_johanna.name: Sins Exposed
SinsExposed_johanna.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 70.72 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

SiphontheDead_diablo.name: Siphon the Dead
SiphontheDead_diablo.description: Activate to heal 15.6% of your maximum Health over 3 seconds.

SiphoningArrow_valla.name: Siphoning Arrow
SiphoningArrow_valla.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.name: Siphoning Impact
SiphoningImpact_kerrigan.description: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10.15% of her maximum Health.

SiphoningRunes_gall.name: Siphoning Runes
SiphoningRunes_gall.description: Runic Blast heals for 20% of the damage dealt against Heroes.

SiphoningToxin_lunara.name: Siphoning Toxin
SiphoningToxin_lunara.description: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18.72 (+4% per level) Health a second.

SixthSense_kharazim.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_kharazim.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

SixthSense_illidan.name: Sixth Sense
SixthSense_illidan.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

SizzlinAttacks_tychus.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
SizzlinAttacks_tychus.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50.00% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 5 Mana.

SkeletalMages_xul.name: Skeletal Mages
SkeletalMages_xul.description: Vector Targeting Summons 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 48.75 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

SkeletonMastery_xul.name: Skeleton Mastery
SkeletonMastery_xul.description: Increases the maximum amount of Skeletal Warriors to 6 and increases their damage by 50%.

Skullcracker_muradin.name: Skullcracker
Skullcracker_muradin.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target will stun them for 0.25 seconds.  Passive: Increases Muradin's Basic Attack Speed by 25%.

SkyboundWisp_lunara.name: Skybound Wisp
SkyboundWisp_lunara.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.name: Slaughterhouse
Slaughterhouse_thebutcher.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

Sledgehammer_muradin.name: Sledgehammer
Sledgehammer_muradin.description: Deals 301% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Destroys 4 ammo from Structures.

SleightofHand_tracer.name: Sleight of Hand
SleightofHand_tracer.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

SliceandDice_valeera.name: Slice and Dice

SlimeAdvantage_murky.name: Slime Advantage
SlimeAdvantage_murky.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage to Slimed targets.

SlimeTime_murky.name: Slime Time
SlimeTime_murky.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

SlimyPufferfish_murky.name: Slimy Pufferfish
SlimyPufferfish_murky.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

Slip_lucio.name: Slip
Slip_lucio.description: Passing through or near an enemy Hero during Wall Ride's effect increases its Movement Speed bonus to 69.985% for 1 second.

SlipintoShadow_zeratul.name: Slip into Shadow
SlipintoShadow_zeratul.description: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

SlipperyWhenWet_murky.name: Slippery When Wet
SlipperyWhenWet_murky.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.  Reduce the cooldown of Safety Bubble by 2 seconds.

Slipstream_tracer.name: Slipstream
Slipstream_tracer.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

SlowBurn_ragnaros.name: Slow Burn
SlowBurn_ragnaros.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

SlowingMines_sgthammer.name: Slowing Mines

SlowingSands_chromie.name: Slowing Sands
SlowingSands_chromie.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

SmokeBomb_valeera.name: Smoke Bomb
SmokeBomb_valeera.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

SnipeMaster_nova.name: Snipe Master
SnipeMaster_nova.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy Hero.

SnowCrash_jaina.name: Snow Crash

Snowstorm_jaina.name: Snowstorm
Snowstorm_jaina.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

SolariteReaper_artanis.name: Solarite Reaper
SolariteReaper_artanis.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

SomaTransference_abathur.name: Soma Transference

SonicAmplifier_lucio.name: Sonic Amplifier

SoothingBreeze_kharazim.name: Soothing Breeze

SoulCatcher_diablo.name: Soul Catcher
SoulCatcher_diablo.description: Black Soulstone passively generates a Soul every 4 seconds.

SoulFeast_diablo.name: Soul Feast

SoulHarvest_nazeebo.name: Soul Harvest

SoulShield_diablo.name: Soul Shield

SoulSteal_diablo.name: Soul Steal

SpatialEcho_tracer.name: Spatial Echo

SpatialEfficiency_abathur.name: Spatial Efficiency
SpatialEfficiency_abathur.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

SpecializedToxin_nazeebo.name: Specialized Toxin

SpectralLeech_leoric.name: Spectral Leech

SpeedBarrier_zarya.name: Speed Barrier

SpeedDemon_diablo.name: Speed Demon

SpeedMetal_etc.name: Speed Metal

SpeedofTwilight_gall.name: Speed of Twilight

SpiderColony_nazeebo.name: Spider Colony

SpinToWin_thelostvikings.name: Spin To Win!

SpiritAlly_kharazim.name: Spirit Ally

SpiritBond_rexxar.name: Spirit Bond
SpiritBond_rexxar.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

SpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.name: Spirit of Arachyr
SpiritofArachyr_nazeebo.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

SpiritwalkersGrace_rehgar.name: Spiritwalker's Grace

SplinterShot_sylvanas.name: Splinter Shot

Sprint_tyrande.name: Sprint
Sprint_tyrande.description: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

StageDive_etc.name: Stage Dive

StarWoodSpear_lunara.name: Star Wood Spear

Starfall_tyrande.name: Starfall
Starfall_tyrande.description: Deal 94.64 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

StaticCharge_tassadar.name: Static Charge

StaticShield_falstad.name: Static Shield

SteelResolve_raynor.name: Steel Resolve

StickyBomb_tracer.name: Sticky Bomb

StickyFlare_brightwing.name: Sticky Flare
StickyFlare_brightwing.description: Enemies hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed slowed by 40% for 2 seconds.

StimDrone_ltmorales.name: Stim Drone

StimPack_tychus.name: Stim Pack
StimPack_tychus.description: After using Run and Gun, gain 20.00% Attack Speed and 20.00% Movement Speed for 3 seconds

StoneWolves_thrall.name: Stone Wolves

Stoneform_muradin.name: Stoneform

Stoneskin_sgthammer.name: Stoneskin
Stoneskin_sgthammer.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

StormFront_jaina.name: Storm Front
StormFront_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

StormofVengeance_valla.name: Storm of Vengeance
StormofVengeance_valla.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

StormShield_brightwing.name: Storm Shield
StormShield_brightwing.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

StormEarthFire_chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
StormEarthFire_chen.description:
After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12.15 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.
Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

Stormcaller_rehgar.name: Stormcaller
Stormcaller_rehgar.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 40.

StormstoutSecretRecipe_chen.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe

Strangle_valeera.name: Strangle

Subdue_johanna.name: Subdue
Subdue_johanna.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

Submerge_ragnaros.name: Submerge

SubterraneanShield_anubarak.name: Subterranean Shield

SunKingsFury_kaelthas.name: Sun King's Fury

Sundering_thrall.name: Sundering
Sundering_thrall.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 301.6 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 second.

SunfireEnchantment_kaelthas.name: Sunfire Enchantment

Superheated_ragnaros.name: Superheated

SuperiorSchematics_gazlowe.name: Superior Schematics

Superstition_nazeebo.name: Superstition

SurgeofStamina_cho.name: Surge of Stamina

SurgingDash_cho.name: Surging Dash

SurgingWinds_lili.name: Surging Winds

SurvivalInstincts_abathur.name: Survival Instincts
SurvivalInstincts_abathur.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

SustainedAnomaly_zeratul.name: Sustained Anomaly
SustainedAnomaly_zeratul.description: The Singularity Spike explodes for area damage and slows, regardless if it hits a target or not.

SustainedCarapace_abathur.name: Sustained Carapace

SustainingPower_alarak.name: Sustaining Power
SustainingPower_alarak.description: Increases the healing Alarak receives from dealing damage to Heroes with Lightning Surge by 30%.

SwiftPursuit_dehaka.name: Swift Pursuit

SwiftReflexes_chen.name: Swift Reflexes
SwiftReflexes_chen.description: Every 4 seconds Chen can dodge an enemy Hero's Basic Attack, preventing all of its damage.

SwiftRetribution_tyrael.name: Swift Retribution
SwiftRetribution_tyrael.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

SwiftSweep_auriel.name: Swift Sweep
SwiftSweep_auriel.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

SwirlingDeath_zuljin.name: Swirling Death
SwirlingDeath_zuljin.description: Twin Cleave's Axes cycle twice and can hit enemies on each revolution, but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

Symbiosis_dehaka.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis_dehaka.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

SymbioticArmor_anubarak.name: Symbiotic Armor
SymbioticArmor_anubarak.description: Anub'arak's Beetles are also granted a Shield equal to 270.40 (+4% per level).

SynaesthesiaAuditiva_lucio.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
SynaesthesiaAuditiva_lucio.description: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on Lúcio.

SystemShock_ltmorales.name: System Shock
SystemShock_ltmorales.description: Displacement Grenade slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds. The slow amount decays over its duration.

TacticalEspionage_nova.name: Tactical Espionage
TacticalEspionage_nova.description: While Stealthed, Nova gains 4 Mana per second.

TakingFlight_rexxar.name: Taking Flight
TakingFlight_rexxar.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

TalRashasElements_liming.name: Tal Rasha's Elements

TargetPurified_artanis.name: Target Purified

Taskmaster_gall.name: Taskmaster
Taskmaster_gall.description: Reduces the cooldown of Shove by 10 seconds. Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the Cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

TasteforBlood_azmodan.name: Taste for Blood

Taunt_varian.name: Taunt
Taunt_varian.description: Force the target Hero to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health increased by 30%. Passive: Gain 15 Armor.

Tazdingo_zuljin.name: Taz'dingo!
Tazdingo_zuljin.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

TazerRounds_nova.name: Tazer Rounds
TazerRounds_nova.description: Increases the duration of Pinning Shot's slow to 4 seconds.

TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.name: Tempered by Discipline
TemperedbyDiscipline_valla.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

TemperedFlame_ragnaros.name: Tempered Flame
TemperedFlame_ragnaros.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

TempestFury_thrall.name: Tempest Fury
TempestFury_thrall.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

TemplarsWill_tassadar.name: Templar's Will
TemplarsWill_tassadar.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. undefinedReward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 150%. </c>Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 20.

TemplarsZeal_artanis.name: Templar's Zeal
TemplarsZeal_artanis.description: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 150% faster while below 50% Health.

TemporalFlux_liming.name: Temporal Flux
TemporalFlux_liming.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

TemporalLoop_chromie.name: Temporal Loop
TemporalLoop_chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

TenaciousRoots_malfurion.name: Tenacious Roots

Tenderizer_stitches.name: Tenderizer
Tenderizer_stitches.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

ThatstheStuff_tychus.name: That's the Stuff!

TheBiggerTheyAre_tychus.name: The Bigger They Are...

TheCrusadeMarchesOn_johanna.name: The Crusade Marches On

TheGoodStuff_lili.name: The Good Stuff

TheHunt_illidan.name: The Hunt
TheHunt_illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 261.04 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

TheMastersTouch_medivh.name: The Master's Touch

TheNetherCalls_gall.name: The Nether Calls

TheSequel_thelostvikings.name: The Sequel!
TheSequel_thelostvikings.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

TheWillofCho_cho.name: The Will of Cho
TheWillofCho_cho.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 0, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

TheWillofGall_gall.name: The Will of Gall
TheWillofGall_gall.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 0%.

ThickSkin_greymane.name: Thick Skin
ThickSkin_greymane.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

ThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.name: Thing of the Deep
ThingoftheDeep_nazeebo.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

ThirdWind_muradin.name: Third Wind

ThistleTea_valeera.name: Thistle Tea

ThornwoodVine_lunara.name: Thornwood Vine

ThreeBladeStyle_samuro.name: Three Blade Style

ThrillofBattle_illidan.name: Thrill of Battle
ThrillofBattle_illidan.description: Activate to double the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks for 8 seconds.

ThrilloftheHunt_rexxar.name: Thrill of the Hunt
