ThrowingAxes_rexxar.name: Throwing Axes
ThrowingAxes_rexxar.description: Increases your Basic Attack range by 25%.

ThunderBurn_muradin.name: Thunder Burn
ThunderBurn_muradin.description: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 49.92 (+4% per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.

ThunderStrike_muradin.name: Thunder Strike
ThunderStrike_muradin.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

Thunderstrikes_falstad.name: Thunderstrikes
Thunderstrikes_falstad.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

Thunderstruck_alarak.name: Thunderstruck
Thunderstruck_alarak.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10%, but causes Lightning Surge to slow enemies hit between Alarak and his victim by 70% for 2 seconds.

TidalWaves_rehgar.name: Tidal Waves
TidalWaves_rehgar.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

TimeOut_chromie.name: Time Out
TimeOut_chromie.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

TimetoKrill_murky.name: Time to Krill
TimetoKrill_murky.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7.28 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

TimelessCreature_lili.name: Timeless Creature
TimelessCreature_lili.description: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.

TimelostWisp_lunara.name: Timelost Wisp
TimelostWisp_lunara.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
TimewalkersPursuit_chromie.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chromie's Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes Chromie also gains 5% Ability Power.

TissueRegeneration_dehaka.name: Tissue Regeneration
TissueRegeneration_dehaka.description: Quest: Each time Dehaka collects 50 Essence, his Health Regeneration is permanently increased by 5, up to 50.

TitanGrenade_tychus.name: Titan Grenade
TitanGrenade_tychus.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

TitanKiller_artanis.name: Titan Killer
TitanKiller_artanis.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

TotheLimit_zarya.name: To the Limit
TotheLimit_zarya.description: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by -98.65%.

ToadAffinity_nazeebo.name: Toad Affinity
ToadAffinity_nazeebo.description: Plague of Toads restores 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second for each enemy hit.

ToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.name: Toads of Hugeness
ToadsofHugeness_nazeebo.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 20% after each hop, up to a maximum of 80%.

TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.name: Together We Are Strong
TogetherWeAreStrong_zarya.description: Every 9.734 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per shield.

ToothandClaw_greymane.name: Tooth and Claw
ToothandClaw_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

Torrasque_kerrigan.name: Torrasque
Torrasque_kerrigan.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

TotalRecall_tracer.name: Total Recall
TotalRecall_tracer.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

TotemicProjection_rehgar.name: Totemic Projection
TotemicProjection_rehgar.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

TourBus_etc.name: Tour Bus
TourBus_etc.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

TowerDefense_probius.name: Tower Defense
TowerDefense_probius.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

ToxicBuildup_murky.name: Toxic Buildup
ToxicBuildup_murky.description: Every 3rdconsecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

ToxicGas_stitches.name: Toxic Gas
ToxicGas_stitches.description: Increases Vile Gas' radius by 25% and its damage by 50%.

TracerRounds_tracer.name: Tracer Rounds
TracerRounds_tracer.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

TragOulsEssence_xul.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
TragOulsEssence_xul.description: Gain 8 Mana when a Skeletal Warrior is raised.

TrailofFrost_arthas.name: Trail of Frost
TrailofFrost_arthas.description: Increases Howling Blast's range by 30% and causes it to also root enemies between you and the target for 1.25 seconds.

Tranquility_malfurion.name: Tranquility
Tranquility_malfurion.description: Heals 83.2 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

Transcendence_kharazim.name: Transcendence
Transcendence_kharazim.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 75.92 (+4% per level).

Transfusion_ltmorales.name: Transfusion
Transfusion_ltmorales.description: Increases the duration of Stim Drone by 2 seconds. Lt. Morales also gains the effect of Stim Drone when cast on an ally.

TraumaTrigger_ltmorales.name: Trauma Trigger
TraumaTrigger_ltmorales.description: Gain an untalented Safeguard automatically if damage is taken while below 50% Health. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

TriOptimal_kaelthas.name: Tri-Optimal
TriOptimal_kaelthas.description: The cooldown of Verdant Spheres is refreshed by 2 seconds per target hit with Gravity Lapse.

TripleStrike_artanis.name: Triple Strike
TripleStrike_artanis.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

TripleTap_nova.name: Triple Tap
TripleTap_nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 351.52 (+4% per level) damage each.

Triumvirate_liming.name: Triumvirate
Triumvirate_liming.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

TrueshotAura_tyrande.name: Trueshot Aura
TrueshotAura_tyrande.description: Passively grant 15% Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes.

Tufferfish_murky.name: Tufferfish
Tufferfish_murky.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

Tumble_valla.name: Tumble
Tumble_valla.description: Vault gains an additional charge, allowing it to be cast twice in quick succession.

TumorClutch_zagara.name: Tumor Clutch
TumorClutch_zagara.description: Creep Tumor Mana cost removed. Cooldown decreased to10 seconds.

TurboCharged_probius.name: Turbo Charged
TurboCharged_probius.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 19.894% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

TurretStorage_gazlowe.name: Turret Storage
TurretStorage_gazlowe.description: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

TwilightArchon_tassadar.name: Twilight Archon
TwilightArchon_tassadar.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form refresh its duration.

TwilightDream_malfurion.name: Twilight Dream
TwilightDream_malfurion.description: After <d ref="Abil,MalfurionTwilightDream,CastIntroTime"  precision="2"/> seconds, deal 388.96 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Malfurion's Mana Regeneration by 1.25.

TwilightNova_gall.name: Twilight Nova
TwilightNova_gall.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

TwilightVeil_cho.name: Twilight Veil
TwilightVeil_cho.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 300% for 2 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

TwinBladesofFury_varian.name: Twin Blades of Fury
TwinBladesofFury_varian.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

TwinSpheres_kaelthas.name: Twin Spheres
TwinSpheres_kaelthas.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

TwistingNether_gall.name: Twisting Nether
TwistingNether_gall.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 370.65 (+5% per level) damage.

TwoForOne_lili.name: Two For One
TwoForOne_lili.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

TyrantMaw_zagara.name: Tyrant Maw
TyrantMaw_zagara.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

UltimateEvolution_abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
UltimateEvolution_abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Unbound_illidan.name: Unbound
Unbound_illidan.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

Underking_anubarak.name: Underking
Underking_anubarak.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

UnendingHatred_illidan.name: Unending Hatred
UnendingHatred_illidan.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.1 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

UnfairAdvantage_lunara.name: Unfair Advantage
UnfairAdvantage_lunara.description: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

UnfetteredAssault_greymane.name: Unfettered Assault
UnfetteredAssault_greymane.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

UnleashtheBoars_rexxar.name: Unleash the Boars
UnleashtheBoars_rexxar.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 114.4 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

Unleashed_greymane.name: Unleashed
Unleashed_greymane.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
UnrelentingPursuit_thebutcher.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33.333% upon impact.

UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.name: Unstable Anomaly
UnstableAnomaly_brightwing.description: When Polymorph ends, deal 118.56 (+4% per level) damage to the target and all nearby enemies.

UnstablePoison_sylvanas.name: Unstable Poison
UnstablePoison_sylvanas.description: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 120.64 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.name: Unstoppable Competitor
UnstoppableCompetitor_zarya.description: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

UnstoppableForce_muradin.name: Unstoppable Force
UnstoppableForce_muradin.description: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.

UntappedPotential_chen.name: Untapped Potential
UntappedPotential_chen.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

Untouchable_tracer.name: Untouchable
Untouchable_tracer.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

UnyieldingDefender_zarya.name: Unyielding Defender
UnyieldingDefender_zarya.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

UnyieldingDespair_leoric.name: Unyielding Despair
UnyieldingDespair_leoric.description: Every second Drain Hope is active, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

UptheFrequency_lucio.name: Up the Frequency
UptheFrequency_lucio.description: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 100 to 80 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.35 seconds.

Updraft_falstad.name: Updraft
Updraft_falstad.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range, Shield amount, and Shield duration by 40%.

UpgradedBallistics_ltmorales.name: Upgraded Ballistics
UpgradedBallistics_ltmorales.description: Displacement Grenade travels 50% faster and enemies directly impacted take 33% more damage.

Upheaval_cho.name: Upheaval
Upheaval_cho.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 182 (+4% per level) damage.

Uppercut_cho.name: Uppercut
Uppercut_cho.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

UrticatingSpines_anubarak.name: Urticating Spines
UrticatingSpines_anubarak.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 83.2 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

Vengeance_valla.name: Vengeance
Vengeance_valla.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 35.36 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage you deal with Strafe is returned as Health.

VengefulRoots_malfurion.name: Vengeful Roots
VengefulRoots_malfurion.description: Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant that does 66.56 (+4% per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.

VentralSacs_zagara.name: Ventral Sacs
VentralSacs_zagara.description: (PH) Infested Drop spawns 3 Roachlings and they take 25% reduced damage from non-Heroes.

Versatile_malfurion.name: Versatile
Versatile_malfurion.description: Increases the Mana return of Innervate to 30%.

ViciousAssault_zuljin.name: Vicious Assault
ViciousAssault_zuljin.description: Increases the number of bonus damage Basic Attack hits from Grievous Throw to 6. Basic Attacks against afflicted Heroes reduces the Cooldown of Grievous Throw by 2 seconds.

Viciousness_greymane.name: Viciousness
Viciousness_greymane.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

VictoryRush_varian.name: Victory Rush
VictoryRush_varian.description: Every 60 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 416 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

Victuals_thebutcher.name: Victuals
Victuals_thebutcher.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 3.9% of his maximum health.

Vigilance_varian.name: Vigilance
Vigilance_varian.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 seconds.

Vigor_valeera.name: Vigor
Vigor_valeera.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

VigorousAssault_raynor.name: Vigorous Assault
VigorousAssault_raynor.description: Basic Attacks heal for 0% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

VigorousStrike_tyrael.name: Vigorous Strike
VigorousStrike_tyrael.description: Basic Attacks heal for 0% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

VikingBribery_thelostvikings.name: Viking Bribery
VikingBribery_thelostvikings.description: Kill enemy Minions to gain stacks of Bribe.  Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.

VikingFuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.name: Viking Fury of the Storm
VikingFuryoftheStorm_thelostvikings.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 42.64 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 109.2 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

VileCleaver_stitches.name: Vile Cleaver
VileCleaver_stitches.description: Basic Attacks create a cloud of Vile Gas on the target.

VileInfection_nazeebo.name: Vile Infection
VileInfection_nazeebo.description: Quest: Reach 150 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 150 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.

VileNest_abathur.name: Vile Nest
VileNest_abathur.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

VisceralAttacks_greymane.name: Visceral Attacks
VisceralAttacks_greymane.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

ViscousAcid_zagara.name: Viscous Acid
ViscousAcid_zagara.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

VoidPrison_zeratul.name: Void Prison
VoidPrison_zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

VoidSlash_zeratul.name: Void Slash
VoidSlash_zeratul.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

VolatileAcid_zagara.name: Volatile Acid
VolatileAcid_zagara.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

VolatileMutation_abathur.name: Volatile Mutation
VolatileMutation_abathur.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 142.48 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

VoodooShuffle_zuljin.name: Voodoo Shuffle
VoodooShuffle_zuljin.description: Activate to remove all current Root and Slow effects on Zul'jin.

VorpalBlade_zeratul.name: Vorpal Blade
VorpalBlade_zeratul.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target attacked within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

WailingArrow_sylvanas.name: Wailing Arrow
WailingArrow_sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 237.12 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

WanderingKeg_chen.name: Wandering Keg
WanderingKeg_chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 61.36 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

WarPaint_sonya.name: War Paint
WarPaint_sonya.description: Basic Attacks heal Sonya for 30% of the damage dealt.

WarpResonance_probius.name: Warp Resonance
WarpResonance_probius.description: Quest:Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward:After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward:After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

WarpSickness_artanis.name: Warp Sickness
WarpSickness_artanis.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

WaterDragon_lili.name: Water Dragon
WaterDragon_lili.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 330.72 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

WaveOfForce_liming.name: Wave Of Force
WaveOfForce_liming.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 168 (+5% per level) damage.

WaveofLight_uther.name: Wave of Light
WaveofLight_uther.description: Each Hero healed by Holy Radiance returns 8 Mana and reduces the cooldown by 1 second, up to a maximum of 40 Mana and 5 seconds.

WayofIllusion_samuro.name: Way of Illusion
WayofIllusion_samuro.description: Quest: Every time one of Samuro's Images Critically Strikes a Hero, he gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. </n>Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, he gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

WayoftheBlade_samuro.name: Way of the Blade
WayoftheBlade_samuro.description: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 20% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
WayoftheHundredFists_kharazim.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 50% damage each.

WayoftheWind_samuro.name: Way of the Wind
WayoftheWind_samuro.description: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Stealth increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 24.8%. Reward: After attacking 20 Heroes, Wind Walk's Unrevealable duration is increased to 2.5 seconds.

WeMoveTogether_lucio.name: We Move Together
WeMoveTogether_lucio.description: Increase the base Movement Speed bonus of Crossfade's Speed Boost to 20%.

WeSeeYou_gall.name: We See You!
WeSeeYou_gall.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 15 seconds and its range is increased by 33.333%.

Weaken_xul.name: Weaken
Weaken_xul.description: Increases Cursed Strikes Attack Speed slow from 40% to 75%.

WhirlingDervish_dehaka.name: Whirling Dervish
WhirlingDervish_dehaka.description: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero while Dark Swarm is active by 50%.

WideLightning_alarak.name: Wide Lightning
WideLightning_alarak.description: Increases the width of Lightning Surge's beam by 50%.

Widowmakers_nazeebo.name: Widowmakers
Widowmakers_nazeebo.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

WildVigor_lunara.name: Wild Vigor
WildVigor_lunara.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

WildfireBear_rexxar.name: Wildfire Bear
WildfireBear_rexxar.description: Misha deals 29.12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

WillofHeaven_auriel.name: Will of Heaven
WillofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

WilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.name: Will of the Forsaken
WilloftheForsaken_sylvanas.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

WillingVessel_leoric.name: Willing Vessel
WillingVessel_leoric.description: Increases the healing from Drain Hope to 30% of your maximum Health and Drain Essence to 15% of your maximum Health.

WindShear_thrall.name: Wind Shear
WindShear_thrall.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

WindStrider_samuro.name: Wind Strider
WindStrider_samuro.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

WindTunnel_falstad.name: Wind Tunnel
WindTunnel_falstad.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

Windrunner_sylvanas.name: Windrunner
Windrunner_sylvanas.description: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

WindsofCelerity_medivh.name: Winds of Celerity
WindsofCelerity_medivh.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

Wingman_falstad.name: Wingman
Wingman_falstad.description: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

WintersReach_jaina.name: Winter's Reach
WintersReach_jaina.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

Wintermute_jaina.name: Wintermute
Wintermute_jaina.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

WitheringBarrage_sylvanas.name: Withering Barrage
WitheringBarrage_sylvanas.description: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

WitheringFlames_chen.name: Withering Flames
WitheringFlames_chen.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 0% for 0 seconds.

WizenedDuelist_greymane.name: Wizened Duelist
WizenedDuelist_greymane.description: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

WolfRun_rehgar.name: Wolf Run
WolfRun_rehgar.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

Wolfheart_greymane.name: Wolfheart
Wolfheart_greymane.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 0.8 seconds.

Wormhole_zeratul.name: Wormhole
Wormhole_zeratul.description: For 2.125 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

WoundPoison_valeera.name: Wound Poison
WoundPoison_valeera.description: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 5 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

WrathofCod_murky.name: Wrath of Cod
WrathofCod_murky.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

WrathofHeaven_auriel.name: Wrath of Heaven
WrathofHeaven_auriel.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

WrathoftheBerserker_sonya.name: Wrath of the Berserker
WrathoftheBerserker_sonya.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
WrongPlaceWrongTime_zuljin.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave Axes at the same time, they take 156 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

XTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
XTraLargeBombs_gazlowe.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

YouWantAxe_zuljin.name: You Want Axe?
YouWantAxe_zuljin.description: Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes increases Zul'jin's Basic Attack damage by 1.25. Reward: After attacking Heroes 120 times, his Attack Range is increased by 1.1.

ZealotCharge_artanis.name: Zealot Charge
ZealotCharge_artanis.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

Zealotry_tyrael.name: Zealotry
Zealotry_tyrael.description: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

ZeisVengeance_liming.name: Zei's Vengeance
ZeisVengeance_liming.description: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
